This speaker is just awesome. The audio quality is excellent, especially considering the form factor. If you are a hardcore audiophile, then I'm sure you can find issues to focus on here - but for a small, portable speaker you're not going to do much better. This sound quality is what we've come to expect from Bose, and this product is no different. It's loud and clear, with solid bass. Music just sounds awesome on this speaker, it's top notch. It's almost shocking how great it sounds considering that the speaker is so tiny.The overall design is simple and solid. The construction is excellent, as you hold the SoundLink it just screams out "well built". Visually I like the design very much, but the look is simple and understated. If you're looking for something flashy, then you might want to look elsewhere. The small form factor makes this really easy to take on the go - you can definitely easily carry it in a backpack or even in your jacket pocket or purse. It is pretty heavy though, much more dense than you'd think by just looking at it. It's a brick!I've paired it with multiple phones and my iPad, and the bluetooth setup has gone off without a hitch. I've moved around the house a bit without losing my connection, but when I walked outside to test the range it did drop connection. One thing to point out, is that I've used bluetooth speakers in the past that seem to just randomly drop the connection from time to time, but the SoundLink hasn't done that to me at all yet. Very refreshing!The battery life has been very good in my tests, lasting around 9 hours before running out of juice on me.The only thing that would prevent me from recommending this product to everyone is that the $200 price tag is fairly steep. If you're looking for a high quality product though, and are willing to spend $200 then I'm sure you'll be very happy with this one.

Setting up this NAS is absolutely trivial, WD did a great job making this a quick and easy setup. Within 10 minutes I had everything ready to go, it's really as simple as connecting the network, connecting the power, and then turning it on. Minutes later you'll have an excellent RAID solution all ready to go. I've connected to and used this drive from my Windows desktop and multiple Macbooks - and all of them connected easily and have worked flawlessly so far. Time Machine backups and tons of photos/videos/other data are now living happily in their central, secure location on the WD Red drives (designed for reliability).The control panel for this drive is very extensive and potentially a bit overwhelming. Honestly I haven't tweaked many of the settings, the default setup has been meeting my needs well. I have some experience with the WD MyCloud app in the past, but for my use cases I'm not typically accessing data this way. I've tested it out and it seems to work well, it's just not something that I use often.While not primarily important, I wanted to mention that the physical design of this product is excellent. It's very appealing, clean looking. The drives are easy to access and remove. There is no external display or anything though, just a few blue LEDs. Any diagnostic information has to come from accessing the control panel.One other nice feature of this NAS is that it provides multiple network and power connections for redundancy in case you are interested in hooking up a UPS or something similar. In a small business scenario this is possibly an important feature.

This printer is a great choice if you want a basic wireless home printer for documents. If you want a photo printer or a scanner, this is not for you - but if you just want to print then it could be an excellent option. This printer was very easy to set up and is now connected to all of our home computers and laptops over our wireless network. The print quality in both color and black and white is excellent and print outs can be handled immediately with no smudging. The speed is supposed to reach 19 ppm, and it certainly seems to print very quickly.Perhaps the biggest plus compared to our old printer is the large laserjet ink cartridges. They each generate 1400 or more copies (according to the specs - can update later on when we have printed more things), while the small color ink cartridges for our old printer only worked for about 300 pages -- I felt like we were constantly running low on ink and having to change them out, and we don't even use the printer very often.This printer also looks very stylish and I really like the touch-screen display. It runs fairly quietly and goes to sleep automatically when not in use.

This iPad keyboard/case has a solid design. The keys are comfortable, and the case offers decent protection while being lightweight. The way the magnets are setup to offer multiple viewing angles is nice, and the magnet strength is surprisingly solid. Everything about the design is excellent, but the problem is that the bluetooth pairing is just not reliable. Sometimes it takes multiple times to pair, and often it just loses the connection randomly in the middle of typing. I tried restarting, enabling/disabling the bluetooth, etc. and nothing seemed to help much. Sometimes the connection stays and the product seems excellent, but it's not reliable. Unfortunate, because this product has great potential.

These comfortable headphones deliver excellent sound. In fact, when I connected them to my iphone and turned them up all the way, they made pretty good speakers! (They sound way better than the phone's speakers). I can only turn them up a third of the way while wearing them before the music gets too loud for me. When I turn the sound way down, the music is still clear.  The bass is excellent, and the overall sound quality is fantastic. These are not noise-cancelling headphones, but they do a good job of blocking out most sound, while allowing you to hear if you have to. People close to you will also be able to hear your music through the headphones unless it is super quiet.The headphones are adjustable and comfortable. I have a pretty abnormally large head and my ears are big, and often headphones don't fit me well. Not the case with these, they're well-padded and quite comfortable for me to wear. The only potential downside here is that they are are a bit bulky and fairly heavy compared to other headphones I've had, but not enough for this to be a problem for me. Just be aware they're not the kind of headphones that you put on to go for a run and exercise, they're for when you don't mind sacrificing some mobility for excellent sound.They come with two connectors. One has a control on it the cord to stop or start a song on a mobile device or tablet -- very useful! The other is much longer with a coil to help prevent tangles. The headphones also come with a nice, simple carrying bag.Overall, I'm impressed with this product. They're not cheap, but they deliver a high-end experience. Highly recommended if you're looking for a high quality set of speakers and don't mind something a little bulky.

My wife has an older Macbook Pro from 2011 and it has been running slowly lately. Over the weekend I replaced her hard drive with this SSD and the performance has improved dramatically. Upgrading to an SSD is one of the biggest bang for the buck computer performance improvements, and the different is very noticible. The installation was very quick and easy, it took me around 10-15 minutes to swap out the drives (and a lot of that time was just tracking down the right screwdrivers).The drive itself seems well made and solid, especially given how thin it is. Note that this product does come with a 3.5" adapter if you're installing it into a desktop, but I was replacing a laptop drive so I didn't use it.Everything about this drive has been great so far, highly recommended.

My house was built in the late 70s, and the kitchen faucet had definitely not been updated since then. I spent a few hours today installing this Delta faucet, and it is definitely a huge step up over the 70s special we were running with before! The brushed stainless steel construction is beautiful, the product looks great and whole setup feels high-quality and solid. The short story of this review is that if you like the looks of this faucet, then you'll probably love it. Read on for some more details.A lot of the reviews here mention having plumbers install it for them, but I decided to install mine myself. I'm not great at home improvements, but I do have some experience. Not a total rookie, but far FAR from being a master. If you're a homeowner with a little skill, then you should be able to handle this project.This installation took me a little over two hours to finish, but the majority of that time was spent trying to get the old faucet OUT. This was definitely the hardest part of the process, but after some WD-40 and a little elbow grease I had the old faucet out and ready to replace. The install of the new Delta faucet had a lot of steps, but was very straightforward. Connecting the sink to the hot and cold water was easy enough, but after that there are still a decent number of steps left. There's a battery pack to install, and some wires to run - but none of these steps are really complicated or difficult, just more stuff to do. Pretty easy. After this install, I spent too much time being paranoid and trying to verify that there weren't  any leaks - but everything was good to go and the faucet was working properly.The performance of the faucet is fantastic. The headisn't stainless steel (it's plastic), but it works great. The magnet holds it securely in place, and it switches easily between the different spray modes. Note that this faucet doesn't have a separate "hose" (it's built into the main faucet), so if you had an existing spot in your sink for one like me, then you can use that space for a soap dispenser instead. Unfortunately this doesn't come with the faucet, so you'll have to buy one separately.Initially I thought installing a battery pack into my kitchen sink was a little silly, but the Touch2O technology is actually pretty cool. I'm always cooking, and the idea of being able to turn on the faucet without dirtying up the handle due to the raw meat or dough on my hands sounds great to me. I've tested this feature out a bunch, and it works great. There is also a small LED on the front of the faucet that indicates if the water is hot or cold. Honestly I'm not sure what I would use this for, but it's pretty cool.

I was excited to try this toy during bath time with our baby. He's not old enough to use it himself, but I thought it would be fun to show him the water wheel and sieve and funnel.Unfortunately, the water wheel doesn't work very well. I tried pour water over it fast and slow, to the side and in the middle, and I got it to spin a few times, but mostly the water just spilled off to the sides. Too bad because our baby loves watching things spin!I'm giving this three stars because the toy is very well-made, and I like how any combination of the three pieces fits over the base. The sieve was a big hit! The baby loved trying to catch the water falling through. I think this toy would be a lot of fun at the beach, too.

I'm a beginner golfer and have used these balls for a round of 18. I got off to an incredible start with the warbirds. The very first hole I played with them was my personal first birdie on a par 4. Unfortunately this magic didn't last for the rest of the round and my game quickly came back down to Earth - but it was definitely not the fault of these warbirds. They seem lively, I was definitely driving the ball a bit farther than I usually do. My overall short chipping game and putting was a bit worse than I usually do, but honestly I'm not sure if the balls are to blame here. I'm looking forward to using the rest of the box, and I'd definitely buy another dozen in the future. I'll report back with more information when I get a bit more experience.

This perfume has a subtle scent that reminded me of water at first. The scent is mostly floral with hints of fruitiness, and it lasts for several hours before fading. My wife has been using it, and we both thing it smells very nice. It's a great product for someone who doesn't like especially strong perfumes. It doesn't smell up an entire room as soon as you spray it. The scent is just strong enough to notice, but not overwhelming or obvious.One downside is the price. It's a lot to pay for a very small bottle of perfume. My wife has other perfumes in the $30-40 range that she likes very much - but the scents are heavier and don't last as long, so even though this one is expensive you are getting a solid product for the price.

The bottom line for this laptop is that it's powerful beast in a very small package. If you want a 13" laptop capable of running the latest games then it's a great option. It's not cheap, but contains some high quality components.Read on for a lot more detail:OVERALL CONSTRUCTION/BUILDMy first impression on picking up this laptop is how light it is for a gaming laptop. Sure it's only 13", but I was expecting it to be feel more dense than it does at just around 4.5 pounds. The overall quality of the case is high. I would say that it's not quite as nice as the machined aluminum of a Macbook Pro, but it is light years ahead of some of the cheap plastic-feel laptops I have tried out. It definitely feels 'high quality' in your hands.The design features a glowing blue alien logo on the outside of the screen with a few glowing blue lines on a dark grey background. If you're looking for a "professional" looking laptop then this is probably not it, but considering it's branded with an alien theme - it's a lot more subtle than it could be. Personally I like the design.SCREEN This display on this laptop is a gorgeous 3200x1800 screen, and it looks awesome. The Amazon listing says the resolution is 2560x1440 pixels, but this is definitely incorrect - the one I got runs at 3200x1800 out of the box. The screen is bright and clear, and everyting I've tried out has looked great on it. I'm not personally a big fan of touch screens on laptops, but I tried it out for a while and everything I messed around with worked well. One reason I don't like touchscreens much is that I hate putting blemishes on my beautiful screen from oils off of my fingers, but I have to admit that even after using the touchscreen for a while there isn't really any noticible smudging at all. One minor annoyance with the touchscreen is that flicking away a bit of dust on the screen ends up opening up menus or moving my cursor. Not a knock on this specific product at all, just a personal preference.One thing to note is that with the 3200x1800 resolution on a 13" screen, this laptop scales up content through Windows settings by default. Through "Display" -> "Make text and other items larger or smaller" the default setting puts the scale up all the way. Most programs handle this scaling well, but it's possible that you will run into one that doesn't (like thie "Alienware Product Registration" that pops up, the text is microscopic). This isn't a knock on the laptop, just the reality of running such a high resolution on a smaller screen.KEYBOARDThe keyboard is surprisingly comfortable considering they had to cram it into a 13 inch laptop. The keys feel nice to the touch, and the space is used well. I'm especially happy to see that they found room for page up, page down, home, end, and delete keys. I use these keys often while programming, and I'm glad they're here. So far I've accidentally hit the page up/down keys a little too often, but I just need to get used to the keyboard. The palm rests are smooth and comfortable.There are also lots of customizable keyboard backlight options if that's your thing.TRACKPADThe trackpad on this machine is not very good, it's the biggest negative in my experience with this product. It works alright I guess, but it's not anywhere near as smooth as the one on my Macbook Pro. Given that this is a only 13" laptop, the trackpad is a good size and fairly comfortable to use - but the texture of the pad is a little rougher than I'd like and this leads to scrolling that's just not completely smooth - the cursor tends to jump and skip a bit as you move it across the screen. Right-clicking is also a little finicky, sometimes I end up left-clicking when I intend to right-click. Gestures work fairly well with one major exception:After setup I installed Chrome and started browsing around the web. The gesture behavior was extremely buggy in Chrome. It almost seemed completely random. Sometimes it would scroll correctly, sometimes it would snap the page to the top or bottom, it would often draw strange rectangles everywhere as I gestured. This behavior did NOT happen in Internet Explorer or Firefox, just Chrome. I tried to resolve it through driver updates but didn't have any luck. After research, it looks like the problem is with Chromium specifically, but I haven't been able to figure out a workaround. Here are two threads that have information on the topic:https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topic/chrome/BdaUw9boNSUhttps://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=463350As a result, I'm not able to use Chrome at all, which is a definite bummer because Chrome is my usual browser of choice. I've been using Firefox and the scrolling works very well, but I'm disappointed I can't use Chrome.SPEAKERSWhen I turned the volume all the way up on this laptop, I was honestly shocked at how loud these speakers are. It is MUCH louder than my 17" Macbook Pro. The quality is decent, it doesn't compare to a nice Sonos speaker or anything - but it's excellent for a 13" laptop. Not much bass, but boy are they loud.GAMESIf you're buying this computer then it's highly likely that you're a gamer. I've tried it out on a bunch of different games, I'll talk about them here. The framerates are GENERAL ideas of the fps I was getting, obviously these fluctuate a lot during gameplay. I used MSI Afterburner to get the numbers.Far Cry 4I loaded up Far Cry 4 and it crashed immediately after launching! Bummer! I spent a while on this until I found a random forum post that said that MSI Afterburner causes Far Cry 4 to crash, and sure enough they were correct. Unfortunately that means that I don't have actual fps time data for Far Cry 4. I can tell you that it autodetected 1920x1080 on High, and this was running fairly well - but I scaled it back to Medium and the gameplay was a lot smoother. I'll stick with medium.Fallout: New VegasFallout: New Vegas autodetected 1280x720 on High quality, and it ran at a solid 60 fps. I scaled it up to 1920x1080 at Ultra quality and it ran between 40-60 fps.Civilization VCivilization V is a good example of what I mentioned earlier in the review: Some applications just aren't built to run at such high resolutions. Civ V autodetected 3200x1800 and the main menu was all weird, centered in between big black emptiness in the middle of the screen (Some people talkig about it here: http://steamcommunity.com/app/8930/discussions/0/864980734944032303/). The actual game worked ok though, but only ran at about 12 fps. I scaled the resolution down to 1920x1080 and it went up to about 20-22 fps. Frame rate isn't as important in an RTS as in an FPS, but there you go.The Witcher 2: Assassins of KingsThe Witcher 2 autodetected 3200x1800 at Low quality and ran at about 20 fps. I scaled it down to 1920x1080 and the framerate jumped to 35-50. I upped the quality from low to high and ended up with 22-32 frames per second. I'll also note that The Witcher 2 consistently crashed for me whenver I exited it, not sure why.BENCHMARKSIf you're into benchmarks, I ran a few with this machine right out of the box. I didn't try to optimize these scores at all, they are just what I got with the vanilla machine:3DMarkSky Diver 1.0: 9209Fire Strike 1.1: 3352I also timed reboot, and it was just around 10 seconds. Very fast.BATTERYIt's hard to give information about battery life because tasks vary so wildly, but I just had a battery charge last a little over 4 hours through some web browsing, video watching, and programming.CONCLUSIONI decided to go with 5 stars for this laptop because I think for the correct customer it's an awesome product. I would have given it 4.5 stars if I could due to the lower-quality trackpad discussed above, but I don't feel it's worth taking off a full star for. I've put a lot of information in this review, and I hope it's enough to help you figure out if this is the right laptop for you. If there are any specific questions then leave them in the comments below and I will do my best to respond. I'll also be updating the review in the future as I use the laptop more and more. Best of luck making your decision!

If you like the classic "Wind in the Willows" or Kate DiCamillo's "Because of Winn Dixie", you'll like this book. The animal characters are as delightful and entertaining as Frog and Toad, but the tone is more modern and the adventures as heartfelt as the search for the dog in Because of Winn Dixie.The story is about three characters: a firefly who wants to fly to the moon, a cricket who wants to play baseball, and a human boy, Peter, who misses his best friend. As they befriend and learn to trust each other, they help each other find what they're all looking for -- despite the fact that Peter's family thinks his bug friends are imaginary, and crickets and fireflies are taught that humans are dangerous.This story is appropriate for boys or girls of any age, and includes 15 full color plates of art as well as small black and white illustrations interspersed with the text. It would be a great choice for a child who starts reading early, and needs a longer or higher-level text beyond the level of early readers. I look forward to reading it with my son.

This towel is an adorable gift for a baby or toddler. We received several infant towels as gifts, but our baby was growing out of them. This towel is a larger size that fits a baby in 9-month clothes perfectly, with some extra room to spare. The part that covers the head is plenty large to grow into, also.The colors are bright and true to the photo. We haven't washed it yet so not sure how it will hold up. The fabric isn't super high quality -- but soft enough for baby's skin. I'm very happy with this product overall!

My wife is breastfeeding our 4-month-old son now, and thought she'd give these vitamins a try instead of the prenatal vitamin she'd been taking. We didn't realize until we got them that they suggest taking a pill 3x each day. It's hard enough to remember to take them twice a day. She definitely prefers the convenience of her one-a-day prenatal vitamins (CVS generic brand). Plus, it's a lot more economical - these tablets work out to $23 for only 16 days worth of pills.She hasn't had any side effects from this vitamin - no nausea, even when taken on an empty stomach.Here are how some of the key ingredients compare vs. the one-a-day prenatal (if you take this 3x a day)NewChapter-----------------100% Vitamin C - half the amount as generic500% Vitamin D3 - not included in generic235% Thiamin - 2x as much as generic250% Riboflavin - 3x as much as generic400% Vitamin B6 - 4x as much as generic50% Folic acid - half as much as generic500% Vitamin B12 - 5x as much as generic50% Iron - 1/3 as much as generic67% Zinc - about 1/2 as much as genericCalcium & Vitamin A - about the sameExtra stuff only in the NewChapter vitamin:Vitamin K, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Selenium, Copper, Manganese, Chromium, Molybdenum, plus Kelp powder, Herbal blend, Black Cumin, and TurmericOur OB suggests taking a prenatal vitamin while breastfeeding, so there doesn't seem to be any medical reason to switch to a postnatal, though some of the amounts are quite different. We also don't buy into the organic and non-GMO attributes of the NewChapter brand, which some people might find important. We're planning to go back to the generic brand once she's done with these.

Our dog has had digestion issues her whole life. We started her out on Taste of the Wild, then switched to Blue Buffalo Basics, but she still regularly had soft stools or diarrhea. We kept having to put her on a bland diet, but didn't want to buy prescription food.We switched her to this Natural Balance Kangaroo & Potato food about two weeks ago, and so far, she's had normal stools. She also loves the food - but then again, she loves any food!The only reason I give this four stars is the price. It costs about $55 for a 22 lb bag. You can get a 24 lb bag of Blue Buffalo for the same price, or a 30 lb bag of Taste of the Wild for about $50. So it's definitely not the most economical choice.Also, the food is really made out of kangaroos, which isn't a negative to me, but I do find it a little bizarre... but hey, why not?

For some context at the start: I'm not a professional electrician or anything, I just do occasional home DIY repairs and hobbyist electrician projects.These are two solid tools. They aren't flimsy or lightweight, they both feel very solid and the hinge is extremely sturdy. The strippers, cutters, and crimpers all do the job well. The one negative that I can point out is that the handles are a bit skinny and will likely be hard on your hands with prolonged use. This also can make working with thicker material difficult. For the projects that I typically take on, these tools are perfect.

My favorite thing about this mat is that it's extra long. I've used many different mats before, and I often wound up with my feet off the end of the mat. I'm 5' 10", so not super tall, but still - regular sized mats never felt long enough. Also, this mat is made of a material that feels both firm and soft. I can kneel on this mat without any pain, but it's not too squishy to bear weight evenly.The mat rolls up easily and stores well. It's a bit on the heavy side, but I think that's worth it for the length and material. My only complaint is that when new, the mat has a chemical smell to it, but that should fade with use.Also - word of caution - if your dog walks on the mat, the nails will scratch the surface! The scratches don't do major damage to the mat, they just don't look very pretty.

This set of blocks caught my eye because it allows for two different type of play. My son will be able to build with the blocks from a young age, and when he gets a little older, he will imagine stories about the different characters and items pictured on the blocks. The art style is cute and colorful, the characters are interesting, and I like the many different sizes and shapes of the blocks. They are made of solid wood, and feel substantial but not too heavy.However, the art painted on the blocks may not last. When our set arrived, the lacquer was already peeling off of the shark block, and I worry that little teeth may quickly ruin the art on many more of the blocks!Also, the picture book included with the set is poorly done. The writing is too advanced for the age of the child who will be using the set, and there is way too much text per page. The text is also badly set on some pages -- it overlaps the art. A good editor could have made the story much better.Despite those two drawbacks, I think this is a delightful gift for a young child, and I can't wait until my son is old enough so we can play with it together!

I installed this card into a Windows 8.1 desktop machine with the Windows drivers, and it gets a fairly-solid 3-bar connection. This connection has dropped out on me once or twice, but it is nothing near the chronic signal dropping that many other reviewers have been mentioned. I did not install the included drivers, and it seems like that might be what makes the difference.The physical install was very straightforward and simple into a PCI slot.

Unfortunately the cable line in my house is at one end, and our master bedroom is all the way on the other end - as a result I would get spotty wifi access when using a laptop or iPad in the bedroom. I've been thinking about getting a range extender for a while to fix this problem, and the Netgear Nighthawk AC1900 has solved my issue admirably. The bottom line is that the performance of this extender is excellent. The wifi now covers the entire house (and more of the yard) and the connection is excellent.Connecting the Extender to your wifi is very simple if your wifi router supports WPS (which mine did). Basically all you need to do is plug in the Extender close to your router, press the WPS button and the connection should complete. After this, you can unplug the Extender, move it to its permanent location, and plug it back in. You're good to go. I did have one minor problem with the install: I could not get my 5 Ghz wireless network to connect through WPS. The 2.4 Ghz network connected fine, but I had to use the web based setup method. This was straightforward and worked fine, but a bit frustrating because I tried to get it to work through WPS many times before giving up.I don't think the minor install issue is enough to reduce the rating to 4 stars (I'd go 4.5 if I could). Everything else about this product has been great. Highly recommended if this is what you're looking for.

Exactly what you'd expect! Great tape, works well. Close to invisible when applied, and fits into my large disposable plastic dispenser. If you're looking for this type of tape, this product is what you want!

These are solid shorts. They fit as I'd expect, stopping just above the knee. The material is very light, lighter than I expected, but that makes them perfect for very hot summer days. These shorts look nice enough to wear to work, but are flexible/light enough for exercise or even a swim on the way home. They don't wrinkle easily. Normal zipper with a velcro-surrounded snap at the waist that's a little weird, but not too bad.Not much else to say, a solid pair of shorts!

My dog is a 70 lb black lab/hound mutt and is what they call a "powerful chewer". I've tried elk antlers from a bunch of different companies, and my dog seems to love all of them - but this is the largest and most long-lasting antler that I've found so far. I worry a bit about her because this thing seems to be as hard as a rock, but she's been chewing it for quite some time now and hasn't had any issues yet. Be sure to keep an eye on your dogs while they gnaw away!

I've been searching for a way to make restaurant-style Thai iced tea at home for years, and have finally found it! I tried a bunch of other teas and recipes and nothing was quite right, but this tea is perfect. Brew it up strong, add sweetened condensed milk and maybe a touch of cream and you're good to go! Easy and delicious.

There are a bunch of lengthy reviews of these headphones, so I'll try to boil it down to a list of pros and cons based on my experience:Pros:- Very comfortable- Solid sound quality. I'm not an audiophile, but these sounds excellent to my uneducated ears.- Excellent packaging.- Independent game/chat volume controls.Cons:- Can't hear yourself talk. I know this may sound obvious for closed headphones/mic combinations, but I had only used open headsets before and it was very disorienting/weird.- Game and chat volumes were tough to balance for me. It was hard to get a mix where I felt I was hearing both at an appropriate level. Maybe not specific to these headphones.Also note that when you connect this headset it will require an update via Xbox One, so don't plug them in during the middle of a Titanfall match!

I've used a few different phone mounts over the past few years, and I'd recommend this one if you're looking for a cheap and functional solution. There's not a ton to say, it does pretty much exactly what you'd expect - but here are some specific things I noticed:- It sticks well to my windshield, but won't stick to my dashboard.- The bottom piece swings out so that an iPhone 5 headphone can be used. My last unit didn't accommodate the new iPhone well at all, and I'd have to angle the phone out awkwardly to access the jack.- Phone is held very securely.- Angle adjustment seems straightforward enough during my experimentation, but personally I just set mine in place and leave it in the one position forever.

I use vacuum sealers fairly frequently for sous vide cooking and storage of vegetables, etc. Normally I use the FoodSaver V3240 Vacuum Sealing System, and I was excited to give this model a chance. Unfortunately my experience was very frustrating!The core of the problem is that this vacuum sealer can only be activated via automatic sensor when your bag has been inserted. When it works correctly the functionality is solid, but this automatic sensor is extremely tricky to get to fire. I have a lot of experience with this sort of thing, and I couldn't get it to work. My wife tried and couldn't get it to work either. It probably took us 15 minutes of messing around to get our chicken thighs vacuum sealed for dinner. This automation is not a good thing, and turns this product into something I'm not interested in at all.I'll be going back to the V3240.

Short Review: Interested in getting current with state of the art neuroscience and some philosophical discussions about our brain and consciousness? If so, read this approachable and easy-to-understand book!Longer Review:Michio Kaku is a theoretical physicist with a knack for explaining difficult concepts with simple analogies and clear descriptions. I've been a fan for some years now, and I thoroughly enjoyed Physics of the Impossible, Parallel Worlds, and Hyperspace. I was a bit surprised when I heard that Kaku was extending a bit outside his theoretical physics wheelhouse to write a book about the brain - but I'm very glad I decided to give this one a read.After reading this book I feel like I'm much more up to date with where we currently stand when it comes to state-of-the-art neuroscience. Kaku stresses greatly the avalanche of modern neuroscience progress that was triggered by widespread use of MRI technology starting in the 90s, and this new information is forcing us to confront and redevelop longstanding ideas regarding our brains. A discussion of the various technological developments unlocking this new information leads into some philosophical discussion of consciousness and what makes us 'human'.The bulk of the remainder of The Future of the Mind is focused on how the increase in brain-technology will affect the world, including discussions of telepathy, telekinesis, memory implants, memory recording, potential mental illness cures, brain enhancement, and mind reading. He also discusses different 'types' of consciousness including things like the consciousness of robots and the potential consciousness of alien life forms. The topics covered are very forward thinking, and there is a lot of time devoted to the various ways in which we will likely continue to stride forward in the future (such as the section on reverse engineering the brain). As you can tell this is a huge range of topics, and reading The Future of the Mind it sure sounds like we're just scraping the surface of potential topics with this book. Prepare to feel overwhelmed at how quickly brain science is marching along.Kaku interviewed a huge number of experts in the field of neuroscience, and quotes from their conversations are features prominently throughout. A common pattern in the book is to reveal a shocking-but-true fact or experimental result about our brain accompanied by a metaphor and/or expert quote easing into an explanation that is understandable and clear. This approach works well in general, and keeps the pages turning. I had a hard time putting this book down, and brought it to work to finish during my lunch break. I have a habit of highlighting interesting/important passages whenever I read science books, and practically the entire book was highlighted by the time I was finished by this one!It's hard to come up with any significant negatives for this review, but I have to mention that Kaku's constant movie references grew tiresome for me after a while. Many of the concepts in this book are introduced by way of "This happened in a movie and now it's happening FOR REAL!" I understand the benefits of this approach, but I could have used a bit more variety - I felt the technique was overused. Just a minor complaint, but something I noticed.

This toolset is the perfect kit for your average do-it-yourself homeowner or weekend handyman. If you're looking for professional quality-tools then you'll be disappointed, but if you want a wide assortment of ratchets, wrenches, pliers, keys, etc. for around the house projects then this is a great set. Everything is of reasonable quality, although there are some issues with the finish on a few of the items in my set - it's no big deal, but I thought it was worth mentioning.The case is fairly large and heavy, which isn't surprising because there's a lot of stuff in there. The tools are held very securely in the case, and some are actually in there too tight - it can be tough to get them out. The whole set can easily fit into a closet or the trunk of a car.In summary this is a great set of tools for the price, and includes everything that the average DIY homeowner would expect from a set like this. Highly recommended!

This is a pretty cool LED lantern that I keep handy for situations where I need a light and holding a flashlight or wearing a headlamp is inconvenient. It takes 4 D batteries, which is a lot and makes the lantern feel pretty heavy - but it produces a very bright light. The construction is solid, and the rubber side seems to be quite durable.This lantern does the basics well, but also has a few cool features. There's an auto-shutoff feature that will hopefully save you some batteries if you forget to shut if off. It's possible to position the lantern upside down and shine the light downwards. There's also a USB charging port. I'm not sure how long the batteries will last in this mode, but it's a great option for emergency situations if you really need to charge your phone or whatever.If this type of lantern is something in the market for, then you should be very satisfied with this product.

I was REALLY happy with these!I was concerned that they might be too light and thin and not show well on my fair skin, but they glide on like silk, are nice a glittery, and are very pretty on!although there are five pretty colors, I have been sticking with the two lightest colors, which I feel flatter my skin and eyes the most. I love the green, but it really isn't my color so I don't use it at the moment.Nice quality, and have not broken off or melted or gotten sticky. Easily twists out for use, and so far I have plenty left even though I use them a lot!* Provided for my opinion and review

I cannot give a high star review on these because of my experience. The pills are very small and ofcourse are not coated, but I have never had an experience like this.I put one on my tongue and was about to drink it down with water, but it started instantly disentigrating and broke in half. When I drank my water, one half slid back and somehow lodged itself in my throat, and I had a very severe choking attack. The pills are very bitter, and that made it worse. I was choking so severely, and my kids didnt know what to do. It went on for a very long time, while I kept trying to drink water, but that tiny half stayed stuck in my throat and would not budge somehow.After a long while, most of it went down and I stopped coughing so hard.Now my older son also had taken one and did not have a bad experience, which is why I am not giving this a lower rating. It helped him sleep, so I was at least glad for that.I would just suggest being really careful, maybe it would have been better to pop it to the back of my throat and drink water at the same time, I have never had a problem with any pill doing it the way I did, so I never thought I would have to use a special method.But I have been too scared of going through that again to try twice!Product provided for my opinion and review

I was afraid this might be flimsy, but actually works quite well.I really like the ability to change size so that you can have a thicker or a thinner cut, and it is a big time saver for me!We eat A LOT of potatoes and other veggies, so this cut (no pun intended) slicing time in half.I found it quite easy to clean and easy to use as well. Also it has helped me to go faster and not worry about cutting my finger or having to wash another knife (that is when I usually end up slicing my finger!).Great product so far!*provided for my opinion and review

I have issues walking in boots or dress shoes and often find it painful, so I wanted to try these hoping they would give me some comfort.So far so good!The are soft gel and prevent painful rubbing against the side of your shoe and your toes as well.Took some getting used to for me, because wearing something around my toes made me feel weird at first and I thought I would not like it, but quickly forgot they were even on, and was able to walk fairly comfortably without uncomfy rubbing.Nice product!Provided for my opinion and review

And container is easy to open.*Provided for my opinion and review

You do have to be careful applying it not to drop any in your eyes also.Once on it looks nice if you don't over-apply.In spite of flaking sometimes, I still use it when I'm doing a photo shoot or something, in order to have glam looking eyes.*Provided for my opinion and review

Not only is this in a cool tube with a lid, but it also is a great quality tea tree oil.It works fabulously on my athlete's foot, and heals very quickly.I also use it in my shampoo (by mixing in a few drops into whichever shampoo I am currently using) which is great if I have any scalp itch , and also good for shine!not too thick and not too watery, but in the middle.Good product and I will use again.*Product provided for my opinion and review

LOOOOVE this dress!It conforms to my shape and flatters ALL my curves.It does run small, so I ordered a size larger than normal (I am a 2X and ordered a 3X), and found the fit very flattering.Since I have kind of a large belly area, I wore some shapewear underneath because the dress is so clingy..almost a sweater dress the way it fits.It is SUPER sexy and really shows off the booty :PThe length is a couple inches above my knees (I am 5'6), so it's easy to sit down in without it rolling up.The shoulders do roll up, but I pinned mine down and that worked pretty well. The lower you pull them down, the better they stay that way!The material is lightweight which makes this dress great for every season, and in Winter just throw on a nice sweater or shrug over top and you're ready to go.Looks great with a sexy pair of heels, or even flats or low heels.Overall gorgeous and I highly recommend!*Provided for my opinion and review

These ADORABLE capri joggers are just SO cute!While they come in various colors, I chose the white with black pair, and love them.They do run small, so make sure and order a size up and you should have the perfect fit. I am a size 2x, and I ordered 3x which was just perfect.They are super comfy, great for wearing around the house or out for a casual day in town.Made from good material, they are lightweight and soft against the skin, with no loose threads, pulls or tears.I really love them and have been wearing them everywhere! But I especially love wearing them at home because they are so comfortable.They have elastic band waist, which you can tighten with the string ties or loosen if you prefer.At the calves there are stretchy black cuffs which are loose enough so that they feel good and are not tight.The Betty Boop print is adorable and eye catching.Overall absolutely love!*Provided for my opinion and review

I cannot put into words how CUTE and adorable this romper is!!!As long as you follow the size guide here on the product page, you should have a perfect fit.My daughter got a size XL (usually she is a Large in ladies sizes or an XL in Juniors) and as you can see from the photos, it fit perfectly.It is SUPER comfortable, stretchy in the right places, and looks SO flattering on! Visually, the navy material has almost a shiny look, which makes it stand out even more in a great way.The spaghetti straps are loose enough to be comfy, yet fit closely enough to not fall down.The material seems well made, and there were no loose threads, pulls or tears anywhere on the outfit.This can be super cute with a pair of sandals, or even some cute pumps or wedge heels.Overall just adorable!!!Provided for my opinion and review

Very cute backpack with pretty flowers along the bottom sides and middle!The straps are easily adjustable and stay on your shoulder or back well and comfortably.There is plenty of room inside to carry a tablet pc, books, notebooks and more as well.This is a good size for an elementary child, but also large enough to carry around for a teen or adult.Nice navy blue color will match with most outfits well also.Zipper works smoothly and without snagging, and there are no loose threads or tears.Extra pocket on the front allows for extra storage, and can hold a variety of items inside.Overall super cute!Provided for my opinion and review
Amazing deal and well worth it!

This light is a great addition to my bedroom desk!I get headaches from certain kinds of lighting, so I am thrilled that this one is flicker free and anti glare.It is easy on the eyes yet provides great lighting to read or work by in the evening.The flexible neck makes it easy to turn to whatever position provides me the best lighting, and I can easily change it.It has three light levels, so if it is too bright, it is a quick adjustment to lower just by tapping on the base.The size of the lamp is great for portability and for not taking up too much space.Love this addition to my room!*Provided for my opinion and review

My son likes this vest very much!The material is nice and the fleece soft to the touch.It is well made with no loose threads or tears, and fits snugly while still being comfortably loose enough to wear over a shirt.The zipper zips smoothly without snagging, which is a big plus..always hate the ones that get stuck constantly!Very good looking vest which looks good with jeans or khakis.He loves that it is reversible, so that he can choose which color or material he wants to wear any given day.The low collar is fashionable and comfy also.Provided for my opinion and review

I did not realize how teeny tiny this was, if I had, I would never have bought it.But having said that, it does work well enough, though a bit flimsy.It is a fairly bright light considering it's size, and it is very adjustable to whichever direction you might want to turn it.The quality seems good overall!*Provided for my opinion and review

Nice product that surprisingly has far more room in it than it would appear from outside!Keeps food and drinks nicely chilled, has two compartments, and has an easy to grasp handle for comfortable carrying. Loving this three piece set!These bags are very cute, and all three sizes are roomy and work to carry various items around with you!I used the largest one for a beach bag since it seemed like it would be fairly water (and sand) resistant, and was able to roll up two towels, and some sunscreen, snacks and other items all into this one bag!It's also great for a large purse if you want to use it daily.The medium purse is also a perfect sized purse with plenty of room inside.The medium and small ones are great to keep makeup, change, and other odds and ends inside, and all have a zip closure.The only small drawback is the straps on the large one seem a little flimsy to me, so I attached a thicker strap that I have at home in order to carry it on the beach :).Really cute set, great for teens or anyone who finds this trendy look appealing!Provided for my opinion and review

I am a bit confused because of all the claims made on this product and the insert stating that this is such a great product.I did follow instructions and put in the dryer for at least 15 minutes, but it made no difference at all. This pillow is like any cheap pillow I've gotten from Walmart (except that I have gotten much better ones from Walmart for $5).Yes it is a bit lumpy, but that really would be ok if it was also comfortable, which it isn't.  I would not sleep well at all if this were my main pillow.I do not want to be too negative, but this just is not for me in any way. And I feel that most people would also be disappointed if they paid for this at full price and got the quality that I got. I got the medium one, but it had no firmness at all. I am currently using it UNDER my main pillow (which is a wonderful bamboo memory foam one that Iove), but on it's own I would never want it.I'm very sorry that I cannot really recommend it.*Provided for my opinion and review*

This sweater is just absolutely beautiful! This color would complement any skin tone or eye color but it really is just the perfect navy shade for my blue eyes and fair skin. It does come in other gorgeous colors as well, but this color is just a beautiful deep shade that I love.The sweater is INCREDIBLY soft, which surprised me. It is a thinner material, so it's nice for almost all weather except Summer. Great for Spring, Fall and Winter though!I love the cowl neck which is very pretty, and the silver buttons down the side are a nice stylish touch.This sweater is stretchy, however since it does hug your stomach, and the arms are a little small at the top, I strongly advise going a size up for the most flattering and comfy fit.It is long enough to cover your tummy well, and comes to about the top of the thighs.This looks great with a pair of nice jeans, but also would be nice with a straight skirt and heels.Really pretty and love it overall!*Provided for my opinion and review

Very pretty costume style crystal flower beads necklace!Again, the regular length is a little short for my neck, but does extend a bit, and I also have my own necklace length extender to give a little longer length.The blue crystal flowers are really pretty and kind of glow a bit in candelit lighting (which I found out recently).I think this necklace beautifully suits a nice navy or black maxi dress (or whatever style you prefer), and it looked lovely with my own long black strapless maxi dress!Really lovely costume necklace!*provided for my opinion and review

These multi tablets are packed with various vitamins that we need in our daily routine to stay healthy.They are a nice small fairly thin size, so are easily swallowed (a big plus), and also are coated so that they are less distasteful going down.they do have that taste that most multivitamins have, but not overly so, and again since they are small are easily swallowed so you will barely notice them going down.Great size that will last awhile, and easy to open (in fact these do not have the child lock style top, so be sure and keep them out of reach of kids).Good product overall!*Provided for my opinion and review

I'm super pleased with this tv!I got this on sale from Amazon and was unsure how the quality would be.I did expect it to be larger vertically, but at least it is a lot bigger horizontally than the 32 inch we had before this one.I am impressed with the resolution and clarity, since this is a brand I haven't heard of. Visually very impressive, good clean resolution.The menu on the tv is easy as pie to navigate, with a nice sized remote with a clean simple layout.The sound quality is just so-so, but I did expect that with a lower price range tv, so I was not surprised.It has all the slots you would generally expect on a basic LED tv, and fits all our family needs just right.Easy to set up on the stand also!Overall great tv, and I would definitely buy another one in the future!

Great set of pots and pans!These are sturdily made, with great solid handles, and glass tops which allow you to see inside while you're cooking.There are a great variety of sizes here, enabling you to make a large pot of spaghetti for instance, or just a small pot of sauce.The fry pan is a great size and very roomy, allowing you to fit a good bit of food in at once on the large surface.I love how quickly these heat up, and how long they keep food warm (when covered).  I assume this is because of the thermal bottom.Easy to clean, and very nice looking set as well!*Provided for my opinion and review

0:46 Mins This is a really fantastic set of ceramic knives!With four varying size knives (with sheaths), and one cheese slicer, this set has all you need for most purposes in the kitchen.Each knife is super sharp, slicing right through everything from fruit to tougher vegetables, as well as meat!I have used them for chopping, slicing, cutting on various foods and been thrilled with the ease in which they cut through any food.The handles are sturdy and fit well in the hand, while the sheath each knife comes with is wonderful to slide on and keep you protected from accidentally cutting yourself.The storage box is wonderful and makes it a very nice set to give as a gift, whether to yourself of someone else!Each knife fits in easily, with no difficulty at all. They clean off easily, and do a great job.The cheese slicer is good and sharp and also does it's job well! I really love that I can store them all together in one box to bring out when needed.It is also super handy to bring along to a potluck or bbq so that you have a set ready and waiting should you need it.I am impressed with the quality of this set, and really am glad to have tried it out.*provided for my opinion and review

Good basic storage containers for a low price.They are made of very lightweight plastic, so I am not sure if they will hold up over a long period of time, especially if placed in the dishwasher often.They seal well and did not spill liquid when I had salad dressing inside.Nice little set and certainly worth trying out if you have not before.Provided for my opinion and review

Nice sturdy canvas backpack with lots of pockets!This is a nice tough, sturdily made backpack that has a large outer double pouch on the front with a zip pocket on one side.On the inside there are lots of pouches to stash all kinds of items as well. My son usually goes hiking or camping with his backpack, and with this one is able to store his knives, medical gear, tablet, phone and a lot more inside and in the outer pouches.It's made of tough material as I mentioned, and so far holds up well to carrying a lot of gear inside.The color is a nice dark color which he likes, and it's great for not showing and spills or stains.Great product and my son loves it so far!It does have the two straps to carry it on the back, shoulder, or a top strap to hang onto with one hand.*provided for my opinion and review

I love this dress!The quality of the fabric is just outstanding!I'm sure you all have had those itchy cheap lace dresses or shirts before that don't breathe and are really uncomfortable? This is NOT one of those.This dress is the silkiest feeling lace I have ever come across. It is stretchy, and silky soft. You can feel the quality of the fabric immediately.When I got it, I felt it right away and was thrilled.The sleeves are the same stretchy silky lace as the rest of the dress. They were a bit snug on my upper arms, but I am sure that is because I have pretty large upper arms. I got this in my usual size (XXL) and it fits well everywhere else.As you can see from the product photos, it is really short, and on me it comes to about the top of my thighs, so just be aware of that, and you can always wear leggings with it as well :)It flares at the bottom, and hugs in the breast area, creating a lovely silhouette that skims over the belly in a very flattering way.The round neckline is tasteful, and decorated with delicate little flowers that really set the dress off and make it even more beautiful.Provided for my opinion and review

Very pretty and detailed cherry necklace!the chain is gold tone, and cherries are very realistic and bright and colorful.A bit much for me as I am very minimalist with my jewelry, but I thought it would make a lovely gift for my mother,who is more of a costume jewelry fan.All the cherries seem to be attached well, and all were in place when it arrived.Comes in a lovely gift box, great for storing for yourself or to give as a gift (As I am doing!) to someone special.Also has a nice velvety bag to keep your necklace in, which is a very nice touch also.I did find it a little short for me, but it is adjustable to a longer length. And always easy to add an extender if you prefer it even longer.Very pretty and love the gift box!*Provided for my opinion and review

This filigree leaf design crystal hair accessory is so beautiful!Especially in lovely lighting which really sets off the crystals!My older daughter is getting married at the end of the year, so I wanted to get this for her.Since she is not here right now, I tried it out on my younger daughter's hair, and as you can see it is just stunning!I was not sure at first how to attach it, but I think I did a decent job in the end, by attaching the smaller comb in front on the side, and the larger end around back on the other side.I think it doesn't always lay flat, so might need to find some clear pins just to make it stay better on the back, but aside from that this is just perfect!It also comes in a lovely gift box with a velvet bag to easily carry, or to store it in as a keepsake.Just gorgeous!*Provided for my opinion and review

Super cool looking Blue Cat Laptop carrier bag!It has a good, sturdy long shoulder strap in addition to a top carry handle, and makes it easy to carry around however you prefer.This is a soft bag, so you will want to make sure and be careful not to toss it on the table too hard with your laptop inside!Offers basic protection from dust and dirt, plus easy carrying of your laptop or tablets. One main compartment has plenty of room for the right sized computer or tablets you need to carry.The best part is this cool cat on both sides :) Very cute and very trendy...!*provided for my opinion and review

This awesome bag far exceeded my expectations!Not only FAR nicer than it even looks in the photos, it comes with a smaller bag inside which I wasn't even expecting!Made from faux leather, I am actually surprised at how great the quality is. This is not some thin, crappy quality material, but rather a heavier, nicer material that you can count on not to rip or catch on objects.The skull print is fantastic, and the silky material skull scarf is an AWESOME accessory to either tie on as shown in the photo, or wear in your hair, tied around your arm, or whatever you like to do with it.The metal chains are another great addition, making any outfit looks super punked out, especially if you are wearing a black and silver outfit (As I often am).  The chain straps are long enough to wear over your shoulder if you choose, or just carry in your hand as I prefer.This is a really cool bucket style bag, and Inside there is LOTS of room in the main compartment, plus it has a zipper pocket and a pocket for a cell phone, keys or whatever you may need.Super cool and trendy and I LOVE!Provided for my opinion and review

I do love this cake pop maker!It is so extremely easy to use and very fast as well.They cake pops are smaller than I expected, but excellent for a little treat to serve at a party, or for your own little snack :)I used a cake mix, and simply took a tablespoon measuring spoon, filled each one almost to the top with one spoon, and was done in just a couple of minutes! Although I was worried that they were overfilled (they began cooking immediately and overflowed the cups), it was fine and once cooked I just took a knife and popped them out of the cooker to cool, leaving behind the extra cooked batter with no problem.I actually used the stand to cool them and decorate them on. I had an issue with the sticks where my cakes slid down, so I ended up not using them. It may be the texture of the particular mix I used, maybe it was too thin? But it really didn't matter to me, we just popped them in our mouths straight from the stand. And they were so YUM! Cooked PERFECTLY within just a minute, they were light and crisp (in a great way), and we all loved them!This is so easy to use, we can make pops every day if we like. I also bought a muffin mix to try out, although I haven't yet. I think it would make excellent breakfast pops!I am no chef, so my decoration may look like a toddler did it haha..but believe me they TASTE great!*Provided for my opinion and review

ABSOLUTELY adorable!!!This umbrella is a great size, large enough to thoroughly cover you and even share with someone else.Sturdily made, it opens easily and closes easily, and secures with the strap shown in my photos.The design is so bright and cheerful and cute, it makes a great accessory on a rainy day, while also being useful to keep the rain off!I was very grateful to have this for my daughter on the first day of school, because it rained as she got off the bus.Really nice, and budget friendly umbrella!Provided for my opinion and review

This bag is SO PRETTY!The color is lovely. It's a somewhat deep, medium pink that really POPS, making this a wonderful accessory to really stand out if for instance you wear a striking black outfit, or whatever color you might choose to wear with it. It would also complement a dark "shark" grey especially well.The hardware is very securely attached and classy looking, with nicely sized carry straps that are comfortable to hold as well as attractively enhancing the bag itself. The straps are also very securely attached, and there are no loose threads anywhere, no pulls or bad spots. VERY quality bag.Inside there is an attachable shoulder strap for those that prefer to carry it on the shoulder, but you don't have to use that unless you prefer it.Inside, there are two main compartments,  plus a center zippered compartment, one inside side pouch which is great for cell phones or keys,and then a side zippered pouch great for change and odds and ends.This bag is SO roomy, without being huge and unattractive. Instead, it is the perfect size with the perfect amount of room for me to keep all my goodies inside! I have my brush, compact, lip glosses, wallet, tissues, mints, etc etc. all fitting nicely inside, and easy to find due to the amount of room.REALLY REALLY pretty and I love it!*Provided for my opinion and review

Really adorable socks!I got the penguin ones, which are SO cute.The socks unfortunately do fit a little tightly at the top especially, but also the entire sock was tight.  I think smaller feet may fit these better, even though they are advertised for up to size 9 shoes.The material is comfy and they are stretchy, just not stretchy enough.Adorable, but best for smaller feetProvided for my opinion and review

This  speaker really blew me away!I have tested a wide variety of bluetooth speakers, and this one REALLY stands out.FINALLY some stunning, booming bass! Now to be fair, the others I have enjoyed using have nice bass. But this one tops all of them on overall sound quality, and especially the bass.I was listening to music and turned around for just literally a minute and I heard a crash behind me. I had placed the speaker about midway back on my countertop (which is fairly far back), and it actually bounced itself off the counter and fell on the floor!I was open-mouthed on that one haha :) So I would just say, make sure you have it securely placed when listening to a heavy bass infused song!I love that I was able to use it right away. and it holds a charge for a good long time. I am still using it days later without having charged it again!This little dynamo has the sound of a much larger sound system, and that's even without turning it all the way up.I have used it successfully with my laptop and my android phone, but for some reason it did not seem to work with my Kindle Fire.Luckily, it comes with an audio cord so you can hook it directly to your device in case the device is not bluetooth compatible.The small size makes this very portable, and it comes in a nice little case that makes it even easier to carry around, whether in your car, backpack, or wherever you like. This is fantastic for the parties we have at our house (and at the park), because it provides fantastic sound in a small package.This was so easy to use that I didn't even need the instructions at all.ABSOLUTELY love it!!!!Provided for my opinion and review

This has such a pleasant scent!I read through the list of uses and it sounded like it would be multi-useful, so I had to give it a try. I get fairly frequent headaches, and often use peppermint oil on my temples which is helpful, but the scent can be a bit strong and overpowering for me.This is a much lighter, pleasant scent and I tried it on my temples the same way I use peppermint.  My headache was just a mild one, but did ease fairly quickly after use. That was actually the first day I got this, so I have not had any other headaches since then and can't say if it will work every time!It feels very light on the skin, as opposed to heavier oils that may make your skin feel a little greasy.Small size bottle makes it easy to stash wherever you may need it so it's available whenever you want it.I think it seems a little light so I don't know if it is diluted or not, but as I said, I do like the non greasy feel!*provided for my opinion and review

Super Cool!!!My son is a huge Zelda fan, so I knew he would love this for his car keys.When it arrived, I realized it is much larger than expected. Almost better to display on a desk, or use for other reasons.The sword comes out a little to easily, and there is no way to secure it inside the sheath, so for this reason my son is not going to use it as a keychain, but instead wants to either hang it from the rearview in some way, or make a little stone and secure it to his dashboard with the sword stuck inside, ala Zelda. The size really is great for display more than anything else.But the quality is super nice, and any Zelda fan would love the stone. It's really very pretty and detailed and well made.So, while he may not be using it as a keychain, he still loves it and WILL be using it.*provided for my opinion and review

I should mention first that I am undiagnosed ..but I have all the symptoms of sleep apnea, and my father and mother both had it.I wake up many times a night all night, and never sleep well ever.I tried a machine before, but having things coming out of my nose and air going in and out just bothered me too much.I have also been using sleep aids to help, but I digress.These are  various sizes, and I found what seemed a good size and tried it. Unfortunately for me, I was uncomfortable even though they are fairly soft. I did use them for several nights to make sure and test them out well.  I was impressed that they provide various sizes, and by the softness of them. I am just one of those people who dislikes anything on me when I'm trying to sleep!I was told by my daughter however that I was not snoring while using them, so for that reason I have to give them a good rating, since everything about them is positive, it's just me that dislikes having things attached, on or touching me when I'm trying to sleep.Provided for my opinion and review

I have been using facial brushes like this one since it was recommended to me to help my rosacea.This one works well and I love that it's waterproof so I can use it while bathing as well.The different brushes are easily interchangeable, and are good for both face and body. I love the extra attachments, especially the pumice stone so that I can use it on my knees, elbows, and feet!The brushes are both soft enough to not agitate the skin, but also stiff enough to get rid of the dead skin well.There is just one speed, which is really ok since with my other brush system I only used the lower speed anyway.This is great for helping me skin, especially my face! I use it every day in conjunction with a gentle acne cleanser, and immediately follow it with a light moisturizer, which absorbs so much better into my skin after using this.*provided for my opinion and review

Smells amazing!You don't even have to light it to enjoy the lovely gardenia scent, my entire bedroom smells amazing!I think it's so cool how you can light this and then a short time later be able to massage the oil from it into your skin (or someone else's!)I love the little box it comes in, which you can keep your candle inside of or give as a gift to someone special.Lights easily, and emits a lovely scent after you blow out the candle.The glass is a heavy, quality glass, and this looks very pretty and decorative on your beside table, mantlepiece, or anywhere else!*provided for my opinion and review

1:55 Mins I have tried a variety of 7 inch tablets in the last year, in varying price ranges.This Aoson Quad core tablet is pretty impressive, especially in comparison with one I recently tried out, which had an odd display that was rather hard to look at for any length of time. I actually quite like the display quality on this (Display Technology: TFT Capacitive Touch Screen,Display Resolution: 800 x 480 pixels ), which to me is visually appealing and does not strain my eyes.It arrived very securely wrapped in layers of bubble wrap inside a very sturdy box (also great for storing the tablet in).This budget tablet is surprisingly strong in most major areas that I look for : Display quality, storage expandability(up to 32 GB), ease of use, and app availability.Photo quality is good, but if you are looking for high res top quality images, you would need to spend a bit more money.With a front and rear camera, you can easily take quick photos to share with friends.Sound is good, and for even better sound just plug in a good pair of headphones of your choice.As I showed in the video, everything is very easy to figure out and use. To change the default browser homepage which (at least on mine) is set to a foreign language page, simply click the dots at the top right of the browser page and click general> settings > set default homepageand put it on the page of your choice.I really loved how easy this was to use, without even having to read any instruction. If you have an android phone or other android tablets, you can just pick this up and begin using right away, as everything is laid out in the usual familiar way.Lightweight but clearly made of quality materials, this tablet is a great budget choice for anyone who wants something basic yet feature filled, or for your kids to watch videos and surf the web, or play music on.*Provided for my opinion and review

This feminine lace chemise is so beautiful!It's so light and silky, it feels like a dream against my skin! It's so light and airy, wish I could just keep it on all day!The lace halter top lifts my cleavage and looks so sexy..your man will not be able to take his eyes off you!As I move around in this, it feels so sensual and I feel absolutely beautiful in it.The delicate satin pink bow is so pretty and draws the eyes right to your chest :)The thong is a good fit (true xxl) and feels silky and air thin, almost like having nothing on at all!The material is great quality, and does not have any loose threads, tears or pulls.The stretchy lace halter top stretches to fit and flatters beautifully.Highly recommended!*provided for my opinion and review

SO in love with this adorable dress!Perfectly suited for Spring and Summer, and if you throw on a shrug or sweater it works great for Fall as well!I am a 2x and got the XXL, which is super stretchy and flatters my curves in just the right way!The material is silky feeling, and clings in all the right places, while skimming over the belly, due to the smocked top which accentuates the cleavage beautifully, drawing the eye to the right places!The material is good quality, no loose threads, no tears. It feels really nice against your skin, and is lightweight but not so thin that you can see through.  It stretches to fit where it needs to, yet still manages to flatter the body VERY well.Perfect to throw over your swimsuit at the beach along with a pair of flip flops, or throw on some heels for a sexy look to have a night out!Falls just below the knee, and covers well when you sit down also.  Does not wrinkle at all, even after being folded up and mailed to me!I love the fact that I can just shake it out, and presto: no wrinkles!The color is vibrant and absolutely eye catching and beautiful!This will become one of my faves for sure!*provided for my opinion and review

Great product! Love the size of the bottle, which will definitely last a REALLY long time.All you need for most uses is just a drop or two, so this will go a super long way.Smells great, and love the included dropper, which makes it even easier to control how much lavender oil you use.Great quality and really pretty bottle!*Provided for my opinion and review

I got this lovely top in gorgeous purple amethyst which is just so pretty!Based on the photo and from reviews, I went a size up to 3x (normally I am 2x), and it fit well!I love the middle twist, which really accents and lifts up your cleavage in a flattering way.Also due to this twist front, it also draws the eye more away from the tummy area which is a good thing in my case!The material is nice, with no pulls or loose strings.It falls just around the hip area and covers well :)Wear with jeans, skirt or dressier pants and you can wear it just about anywhere!Really nice and pretty!*Provided for my opinion and review

I love this!I am a size 2x, and the largest this comes in is an XL, so based on the photo I thought it would probably stretch enough to fit me and still look good, and it does! I am so happy with this pretty sweater!It stretches to fit me, and does not look as thought it's too small at all, but at the same time it would look perfect on someone who is a true XL as well.The fabric is soft and super comfy, and very nice and lightweight, so perfect for anytime of year!Looks great over  a cami, nice top ,etc...look casual, all business, or dressy depending on what you pair it with.Great material has no loose threads and top quality overall.*Provided for my opinion and review

Got these skull print leggings for my daughter in size L/XL. She absolutely LOVES them, and in fact could not stop talking about them lol!She took pictures and posted on her FB account as soon as she put them on.They are SUPER SUPER soft, very stretchy and true to size. They're even dressy enough to wear a little black stretch dress over, or a long flared top, or pair more casual with a tshirt or tank top.They are full length and would look cute tucked into a pair of ankle height boots!Material is very nice quality, with no loose strings. I would probably air dry the first time just to be safe. I always do that with stretchy fabrics!Absolutely love!*provided for my opinion and review

Great info on not just WHAT to spiralize, but WHY.It never occurred to me that my spiralizer is valuable not just for convenience, but to help me and my family eat better.The intro states that  aside from doing this for your picky eaters in the household, those who out of health needs should have a low fat diet can creatively transform veggies and fruits into more appealing meals for themselves and the whole family.Also stated: Creating spiralized noodles made out of fresh veggies provides a healthy and gluten free option for those with gluten sensitivity.There are some really good recipes that I am excited about, including the Beef Stroganoff (made with yellow squash), chicken biryani, and the spaghetti, to name a few.I am just thrilled that I started reading this, because I freely admit, I am not big on veggies (at least not a wide variety), and this creative book really inspires me.*Provided for my opinion and review

This book has some good recipes listed, although not a lot that I was too excited about.However, given the fact that I have major stomach issues, beggars can't be choosers! We have to eat what is best for our bodies.Having said that, I did find some recipes that did appeal to me, such as  potato pancakes, smoothies, veggie chips, chinese chicken, and some others.I did find the information listed about IBS and eating to soothe the gut helpful and much needed in my case. I am tired of suffering!I love the pairing of info on keeping your gut healthy and eating right for the issues you have, plus the recipes themselves.Recommended to anyone like me who needs to eat better for thier gut!*provided for my opinion and review

As an activity tracker, this does the trick.This is not as full of features as the other, more expensive fitbits, but does what it's supposed to do.I love how it syncs with my computer, and it counts calories burned and distance moved.Mostly what I need it for is calories burned, as it helps me to look at this and know that I've made some progress each day.Readout is simple and easy to read, and this fitbit is easy to setup.*provided for my opinion and review

What amazingly soft and comfy pants!I knew from reading through reviews that I would want to size up and I made the right choice! I normally would wear a XXL, but went ahead and got these in 3X and they are a nice comfy fit.I also was worried about how I would look in flared pants, but love how fashionably chic these are.The fabric is just super soft, stretchy, and allows you to move around or "flow" around more accurately.I doubt there is anything more comfortable you could wear to do yoga, excercise, or anything else.The material is quality with no loose threads. Length is just to tops of the feet, can roll the waist down to below hips, or over hips, whichever you prefer!Love these so much!*provided for my opinion and review

This Organic Sonamasuri Rice is absolutely delicious!I can't often say that about a rice.Fluffy and non-sticky, unlike "standard" rices, this aromatic GMO free rice has a light flavor which I can't quite place, though I think it might be jasmine possibly? Whatever it is that causes the wonderful light flavor, I absolutely love it. I could eat this by itself (probably the first time I have ever said that about a rice) easily and be satisfied.Cooks easily and quickly, and stores well, meaning if you reheat it it still tastes light and delicious.*Provided for my opinion and review

This was a great addition to serve with my curry!Fluffy and non-sticky, it fills you up without feeling heavy or unpleasant.Regular rice is bland and often sticks together, but this fluffy Organic Rice parmal is the exact opposite!Certified USDA Organic , and GMO free, and let me tell you, you can taste the difference, and I love this so much!*provided for my opinion and review

Oh no, just NO.I am a huge acoustic fan, but just no.I couldn't get past the first few songs, even though I wanted to LOVE this.So, ofcourse we all would prefer the original bands doing their own acoustic versions, but sometimes covers can be outstanding as well.But sadly, most of these are not even good cover performers. If I heard some of these performers in a coffee shop, I would have to discreetly walk out.Like I'm doing now...3, 2 , 1 (tiptoes away)EDIT (8/1) Since I did stop listening after the 4th song, I am going to go back and at least try to listen to the others to see if there is anything worthwhile on here. The good news is: I found a few that I actually enjoyed!
