I liked "Sugar" , "What the World Needs Now" , "Congratulations",and there were a few more I didn't hate, but you really wouldn't find me listening to them again or putting them on my playlist.The majority of these songs, either I didn't like the song itself, or I didn't like the voice. And in some cases both!There are actually some good voices on here, and ofcourse some well-known singers and bands (Five for Fighting, Michelle Branch, Josh Rading) mixed in with the lesser known (or not known at all).Overall you have some very sleepy, relaxing tracks that you might hear in an elavator, or just something you might enjoy to put on to relax. Nothing wrong with that if that is what you are looking for, but if you are expecting a well put together album of music that you can sing along to or even recognize, then this probably isn't it.I have edited this review and added a star based on a few good tracks that I enjoyed, and even a few that are really good, but just not for me.

This cardigan is a must have for Fall and Winter! I was happy to put it on once I felt how soft the fabric is. I felt like a cloud was giving me a hug! LOL :)The  wonderful thing about products in Charlie a Go-Go line is that they all match and go together, so you can take them and switch fashions around  to expand your wardrobe without spending a lot of money.I find that fashions like these are worth paying extra for, because the quality is very high, the fabric soft, slimming, and comfortable, as well as much more suited to last a long time after washing, etc.The arms on this really ARE slimming...I was so pleasantly surprised by this, given my arms are pretty big at the top. Since the largest this comes in right now is a just a little small on me, I was not sure, but it actually fits quite well and does have a nice stretch to the fabric..Again, cleverly designed to slim down where it needs to, this is really flattering for my body type, and I feel safe saying it would flatter any body type,I paired mine with this tummy tank listed here:Charlie a Go-Go Women's Tummy Tank 12 French VanillaHighly recommended!(provided for my opinion and review)

I am super happy with this fantastic "tummy" tank top!It looks so lovely on the model here, that I hoped it would also flatter my body type (with a much rounder belly!).It arrived very nicely packaged, and upon removing it from packaging, I immediately noticed how soft the fabric is!  The fabric is lightweight without being too thin, yet heavy enough that it will work great layered under shrugs, sweaters, etc in cooler weather. Right now it's very hot here in FL, and this works great for me!Also, The hem is tightly sewn and does not have any loose threads.This Charlie a Go-Go tank comes in three colors, and I chose the Orchid shade, which is exactly the shade shown in the photo, so be assured the color is very accurate! I love this color A LOT, and would love to get the other two colors as well, to round out my Fall wardrobe.I feel that worn with a nice shrug or cardigan, such as the gorgeous matching cardigans they have HERE: Charlie a Go-Go Women's Plus-Size Cardigan Cover Up, this is perfect to wear to work in the office, or out on the town with a pair of heels.As mentioned, it is super soft, and the ruching very cleverly hides your belly (if you have one you want to slim down). I was actually worried that it might have the opposite effect of highlighting that area, but instead it tricks the eye and flatters more than you can imagine until you try it yourself.The straps are fairly wide, so that you don't need to wear a strapless bra, you can wear your nicest uplift with this and it does wonders! :)Beautiful and quality, absolutely love!(provided for my opinion and review. All thoughts are my own)

0:39 Mins I love this tank!From the silver embossed logo on the inside (which I am the only one who sees it, but I love it every time I look at it), to the gorgeous shades available (I chose the gorgeous royal blue one), this cami/tank is wonderful.Although this is referred to as a maternity tank, I am not pregnant, but I am plus sized, and a size 18. This fits me perfectly, stretches where I need it to, yet retains it's shape. It should cling to almost any size, and allow room to grow!My favorite thing besides the color is how incredibly SOFT it is. It honestly feels like wrapping your skin in a soft cloud. Normally only sleepwear is this soft, so I absolutely adore it. And by the way, it also WOULD make a nice sleep cami as well!You can layer this tank under other tops, wear with a shrug thrown over, or wear it alone in the Summer to be more comfortable in the heat.The straps are very thin, which I like because it feels so light on my skin. While it flatters the bosom, it's still enough coverage not to have anything falling out the top! :)Beautiful and versatile, this is a real winner for my closet!*Provided for my opinion and review

Very beautiful! I got this in the Aqua shade, and absolutely love the color! It looks exactly the same shade as the picture shows. It's a very bright and happy shade which really perks up my room!Both my kids came in the room at separate times and asked me if I had bought a new comforter, then told me how pretty they thought it was.It was pretty easy to insert my comforter inside, and snap the buttons closed on the cover.This is very lightweight fabric, fairly thin. I love that in this hot weather we are having here in Florida.It feels nice and cool against the skin, and the ends are sewn well, with no hanging threads, even after a few washes.Just adding this three piece set to my bed has changed the entire look, and I love adding this gorgeous color to my room decor!*Product provided for my opinion and review

Once again, SO much nicer than I even expected!This soft and supple messenger/camera bag is a lovely retro dark brown, and harkens back to years ago, with a delightfully retro look.Although it says in the description that the leather may have an odor due to not being chemically treated, but I did not notice a scent and I am extremely sensitive to smells normally.The leather is very soft and pleasant to the touch..as well as visually. This bag can be used in a wide variety of ways. It has the soft, cushioned inner compartments for camera equipment, or you can use those compartments for other items, or not at all! I was looking inside and thought it would be great as a carry-all to the office, with more than enough room for tablets, snacks, phones..even a small change of clothes!It seems like there are pockets and compartments and places to store things EVERYWHERE in this bag, while still being lightweight enough to carry around frequently. The inner , padded camera caddy is removable and slides right out, allowing you to easily access your equipment once you get to your location, or just allowing you to leave it at home and use the bag for notebooks, paperwork and tablet etc.On the interior on the front panel are slots to secure your cell and keys as well.The padded caddy has three compartments separated by velcroed portions, and each velcroed portion is easily removable to give even more space for your equipment, should you require it.I found all the materials to be super soft, easily maneuverable, very very high quality, and beautifully appealing to the eye.There is also a long carry strap included that you can attach to the rings on the sides should you wish to.The straps secure tightly and work well, though I generally prefer a zipper closure which I find faster to open. Still, no complaints here, this retro leather bag is gorgeous and a great find!*Provided for my opinion and review

I love the light lemon scent this product has - it's very clean and refreshing! I also like that while it appears to be an effective moisturizer it's also very light. I can't say if it balanced my skin or not, but I do like it. The instructions are to apply 2X daily, morning and evening, but I only use it in the morning.

Honestly, I was debating giving this 5 stars or 3 stars. If you love sweet smelling candles then this is a 5 star candle, if not then it's a 3 star.It arrives beautifully packaged and yes it does come with matches :)It's very heavily scented but still burns clean.I'm actually not a fan of the maple vanilla scent (don't ask me why I thought it would smell different but I did). This would be a great kitchen candle as the scent is true.If this company makes other scents I'd certainly buy them - even not being a huge fan of the scent I'm still loving this candle. It appears extremely well made and from what I can tell is slow to burn :)

This device has made a huge difference on my cystic acne. I use it right on the onset of a breakout, 2X daily and I've noticed it really prevents breakouts from forming, and speeds up the healing of existing acne.When you open the box all you have to do is plug it in and charge it for 24 hours. After that using it is as simple as turning it on, pressing it gently against the area you are treating and wait for it to shut off.I didn't notice an excessive heat or any thing.

I was torn as to give this 4 stars or 5, the cherry scent is almost overpoweringly cherry but the product itself left my skin so soft I had to give this a 5 star review :)You only need a small amount to get amazing results.

I guess I kind of like this as a body moisturizer, as a facial moisturizer not so much. While I'd like to love this cream I just can't... It's way too heavy for my face, and really not heavy enough for my body. It does leave your skin soft, I'll give it that, and it actually absorbs very quickly. But after applying it to my body my skin feels slightly powdery and a bit thirsty. Plus the smell is strange - like Vaseline Intensive care Lotion. Not a fan.The tub I received is huge, plus it came with 2 smaller travel tubs as will, so I think I'll be stuck with this for a while.I plan to use this up, but I won't be repurchasing.

This is actually a really nice facial scrub. You need only a small amount of product and a lot of water :)It was very gentle and while I imagine it will take longer to see results because it is so mild, I do feel that this is the best facial scrub for me.I have cystic acne and used this during a breakout and had no pain, irritation.

This is a lotion you really need to smell in person before purchasing online. While I like the scent, I'm honestly not in love with it. It's for men and women, yet it's a bit too manly for women and a bit too girly for men.The scent is mossy and a bit woodsy. Very nice actually, just not for me. The lotion itself is very nice - non greasy, quickly absorbed and leaves skin silky smooth.

I was pleasantly surprised by this mask! it didn't burn or irritate my skin. It did leave my face feeling tight and yes, a bit dry (nothing my moisturizer couldn't fix though!)My skin did feel clean after using this - deep clean. Because my skin is sensitive Im only using this once a week, so I can't say if it helps with fine lines / wrinkles, but it is very nice and I'll be purchasing it again.It is mud, and while the jar isn't huge you only need a thin layer to cover your face so I imagine it'll last quite a while.I used the handle fan brush that was included and applied a thin layer onto my clean face. After 5 minutes it was dry and I was able to remove it easily with warm water and a wash cloth. I really liked that it felt cool and refreshing while it was wet.

I purchased this because the three other reviewers raved about it. It smells nice, and it is moisturizing but no more so than other, cheaper foot balms out there.It wasn't anything special. Yes, it did soften my heels, but it wasn't over the top amazing. The scent is really nice, but it's a warm scent. I'd be more inclined to use this in the winter. In the summer I prefer cooling, minty foot balms.

Where to begin.... First of all, I'm a U.S. size 8, yet this waist cincher in a size large was insanely small - to give you an idea: I put this on my size 2 teenage daughter and it fit her perfectly. It does lace up in the back, but that only goes so far. This ships from Japan, so perhaps sizing is different there???I'm glad I could give this to my daughter as I'm sure return postage would exceed the item price.It's also of a cheap material and I doubt my daughter will get much wear out of it before it's useless.There are many, many corsets out there - steer clear of this one.

Love Davines! I tried this on a day when I wasn't going out (some products create havoc with my hair). The scent is very pleasant, the shampoo left my hair feeling clean and it lathered well.The conditioner was a bit heavier than I expected, so the greasy hair may have been the result of me being heavy handed with the conditioner.I actually really like this product and will continue to use it :)

I liked this book a lot. As a "first in a new series" it was very engaging and entertaining. The plot was slow to start, but within a few chapters I was sucked in.All in all, this new cozy has the making for a fine series!I don't like to give away story lines or plots in reviews, but this book takes place in a small town, when Poly (short for Polyester) inherits the families abandoned material store & murder takes place.Not only is there a new murder as soon as Poly arrives in town, but she also is trying to solve the murder of her great-aunt.

I love this series, as well as the "dead-end job series", so I was thrilled when this book arrived. At first I was uncomfortable because as I started reading I realized this book did have a plot that dealt with animal abuse. But Elaine Viets wrote this book in such a, well.. Cozy way that even I (a die hard animal lover) didn't have an issue with it.The story line itself was very engaging and entertaining, and I loved the character progression.This is a series you can pick up in the middle and not be lost - although you'll love it so much you'll want to start the series from book 1!If you've been following the series, a lot of things happen with Josie, Jane and Amelia - so it's not just about a murder to solve. Underage drinking, peer pressure is also addressed. Making the book much more "real life".All in all this was a great read!

This was just OK, I normally use 2 minute miracle gel, but after seeing the glowing reviews for this I thought I'd give it a try. It does work (basically the same as miracle gel), my only issue is the spray top. I can't just spray my face (my eyes don't need exfoliating), so application became an issue.However if you love this line then I can recommend this as an exfoliator - it does do what it claims to do.

This whipped shea is seriously THE BEST moisturizer out there! It's so light... when you get the tub it will feel empty (lol). A tiny amount warmed in your hands will turn to oil which you can then apply to your body or hair. I use this as a body moisturizer and my skin has never felt so soft! After I apply it to my entire body I run my hands along the ends of my hair and it keeps my hair from getting fly-aways :)For the price, this product is a serious miracle worker!

This product DID make my skin look smooth and appeared to "fill in" fine lines, BUT it was way too heavy for my skin & caused a major breakout. The tube is a generous size, and considering you need less than a pea sized amount to cover your entire face I think it is well worth the price as this tube should last a long time.If you have acne prone skin this may not be for you - its very heavy and no matter how little product I used, my skin felt greasy.

When I received a sample of this I wasn't sure I'd like it. After 1 use I was pretty much hooked :)I know it *can* replace your regular skin care routine! but I preferred to add it to mine and the results! while not as miraculous as the claims made, are certainly impressive.I don't know exactly what this product does, but it makes my skin feel soft and smooth. I know it is exfoliating it to an extent because if I put on my normal exfoliant cream on after this it burns like all get out.The jar is small (2 ounces) but you don't need much to get the desired results. I've been using it for a few days now and my skin seems to look better than it did.
These really work! I keep a bottle in my purse and when work gets stressful and I find myself getting worked up I find relax now really does make me relax!They don't make me tired, just calm.

I bought this mainly to clean my jewelry. Sadly it was no better (but much more expensive) than regular jewelry cleaner. I'm not a fan of Amway products as it is, but purchased this specifically based off reviews claiming how awesome it was for jewelry.I didn't bother to send it back, but I highly doubt I'll use it any time soon for general cleaning & I imagine at some point it'll get pushed to the back of the cupboard until I throw it away.
This went right back to Amazon. First of all I only received the shampoo, not shampoo and conditioner as advertised.

I received a sample of this product and tried it before I purchased it. My first impression was EEWWW!!! Chunky green muck with lumpy leaves. But since I already had it in my hand I bravely applied it to my face. I didn't leave it on for more than 10 minutes before the "tingle" (read as BURNING SENSATION) got to me & in a panic I rinsed it off.My God, within an hour my skin felt so soft, felt to good, and had a healthy glow to it. At that moment I had to have it!When using this I suggest covering your sink drain with muslin or cheesecloth to prevent blocking up your drain as the leafs are abundant.I am in love with this product!

This is weird and kinda cool at the same time. It has suction cups on the bottom, so it doesn't slide around the tub (but it does wiggle a bit while you're using it), but is easy to remove after use.It scrubs my feet - yes, but really doesn't do much to remove dead skin or anything. This is just a stuff brush. It'll never replace a pedicure, but I do enjoy using it.

I was foolish and assumed by Spa Soothing Tonic that this would soothe my skin. It did the exact opposite and irritated my sensitive skin. The first time I used it was fine, but the next morning my skin felt really dry so I applied more of this product. By noon my face was a mess.I'm guessing I'm allergic to something this contains.This may work well for others, but it didn't work for me at all.

For $10.00 I expected to be blown away by this lip balm. Chapstick works better than this, and is much cheaper. The only thing I liked about this was the scent - it smells like grape Hubba Bubba bubble gum.
I liked this lotion a lot, the light citrus scent was especially nice. I found it a little thin though, and didn't find it to be spectacular as far as moisture went.

About 20 years ago I was hooked on all things Clinique, and used this body butter religiously. My one beef was that it was in a jar. For whatever reasons I began exploring other options and left my Clinique world. Well, many lotions later  (Flash forward to 2014) and low and behold I find deep comfort body lotion in a bottle here on Amazon! With a pump no less! Made my day :)However, after 20 years of lotion trial and error I found that this product isn't what I once thought it was. The smell was chemical-y and I found it I unappealing, the lotion was heavy and slow to absorb into my skin.I don't think this is a knock off product or anything, I just thing that after 20 years I discovered better products than this and going back to it was a huge disappointment.I will give all you ladies a heads up - when I was pregnant the lady at the Clinique counter swore that applying this daily would help prevent stretch marks.... It didn't.

I fell in love with this lotion while at a salon. The cute bottle caught my eye (how adorable by the kitchen sink was my thought), but the scent reeled me in. It's grape, but a wine-y kind of grape. Light and not over powering. You can wear this and not smell like a wino ;)As far as moisturizing properties, I haven't seen the dramatic results others have mentioned in their reviews, but I do think this would be great for winter months. To me it feels slightly greasy, but nothing so awful that I can't handle it. And it does absorb rather quickly. What I did notice is that after application my skin looks like I've applied oil and it hasn't sunk in yet, even though my skin is not wet or oily to the touch.

When I opened this I was SO excited! The container was so pretty and the candle smelled amazing! So right away I placed it in our bedroom and lit it. I was thrilled.... It looked even prettier lit!That is where all my happiness stopped. This candle burned so dirty you could see the black smoke coming off of it (yes, I trimmed the wick). After an hour of burning I noticed the candle did scent the room quite nicely, but the black smoke was more than I could handle. I've tried burning "dirty burning" candles in the past and all they've done is left black soot on the walls of the room.So I blew this out then threw it out.
I have 4 dogs, my parents have 2. Out of 6 dogs not one of them would eat these "wafers". And FYI: wafer implies a think disc, not a giant pill (which is what this is)

I have bunions and bought these. Do not follow my example. They were extremely uncomfortable and for a sock claiming to fit size 6-10, I'll tell you I had a heck of a time stuffing my size 8 foot into it. And the weird toe divider thingy just made things worse.These socks are now used as dust cloths since there's no other use for them.
Loved this short story!

I really loved One Knight Standing, written by Kate Robbins and Ian Gillies. It is a beautiful tale to enjoy! A must to read!One Knight Standing, is the story of William, a charming knight and Catherine, a determine young woman who lives at Rosslyn Castle. It all started when the clan priest had died mysteriously and had to be replaced, enters Will, at Rosslyn, but he looks more like a warrior than a priest. Catherine, is curious, and wants to discover who is really Will! And she is so nave, I adored the part when she confessed her sins of impure thoughts! This scene was so cute and done with a touch of humor. The chemistry between Will and Catherine is adorable. Will they discover the true mystery behind Rosslyn Castle?This story is truly fun to read, with mystery, love, romance and humour. Ms. Robbins never disappoints me! She is truly a very talented writer! It was so nice to me her co-author Ian Gillies, hoping that he will write alone a book!

Book #1  Fantastic and captivating 6 stars!OMG, what a fantastic and captivating story! I finished reading To Bewitch a Highlander, written by a new-to-me author Lily Baldwin! It's has been a long time, since I have read an excellent Scottish romance like this one. I am totally surprise! I really loved it very much! I will mention that this book is mostly the love story of her two main characters! I fell in love with her heroine Shoney who was a healer and a Pict; you will have to read this story to understand who the Picts were. Ronan, a great warrior, was the heir to the leadership of the MacKinnon clan. Together, they will pull you slowly into their lives and discover that their story was closer to reality with some historical details to create an ambiance. Their loves scenes are passionate and very well written, always with a touch of tenderness. You have to love Shoney and Ronan, they are so beautiful together and the chemistry between these two is passionate and stormy! Ms. Baldwin added family and friends to create an atmosphere of togetherness, I liked Aidan, Ronan's oldest friend. Ms. Baldwin is a natural storyteller and an excellent writer. I love that she added a touch of witchcraft, I find this element fascinating. I will have to watch her next books; I am certain that she will surprise us with another great story. It was so captivating that I read it until 3am this morning. The sequel of To Bewitch a Highlander will be titled Highland Thunder. We will meet again Shoney and one of their daughters, Anna who has inherit her mother's gift. I'm so excited to discover who will be the heroine and hero in her next story.Book #2  Breathtaking Scottish adventure as I love them!!! 6 starsLily Baldwin has done it again with her second book in the Isle of Mull series. HIGHLAND THUNDER is the sequel of To Bewitch a Highlander which I found so captivating! This is an excellent Scottish adventure, so fascinating, that I read most of it until the early morning hours and resumed early this morning. We meet again, some characters from her previous story, Bridget, Ronan, Anna. In this one, we meet Duncan, a warrior, devastated by the ravage done by the Berwick massacre resulting in the death of his best friend. Upon dying, Duncan promised him, to take care of his wife Brenna and their daughter Nellore. But Duncan holds dark secrets that will create a barrier between him and Brenna. Wanting to shield his emotions, he did everything to displease her. Brenna did not trust him until she realized that she was beginning to feel strong emotions for him. Will they share the same feelings? Will Duncan be able to forget the past and forgive himself? Will Brenna discover his secret? Will the clans finally be united? I fell in love with her two main characters Duncan and Brenna! I also liked her secondary characters that brought a touch of their own stories nicely blended into this fantastic journey. Their love scenes are filled with tenderness and passion. Beautiful stormy chemistry between the two that will keep you captivated until the end. Will I strongly recommend HIGHLAND THUNDER, a breathtaking Scottish historical romance as I love them! Ms. Baldwin is truly a great writer that we should watch closely.Book #3  Beautiful conclusion of the Isle of Mull trilogy! 6 starsWhat an amazing final story, Lily Baldwin wrote and offered to her readers of her trilogy! To Love a Warrior is so captivating and filled with passion, action and intrigues. This one is the story of Garick and Nellore, two beautiful Scottish souls, who knew each other ever since they were young and finally fell in love. Their story is so touching! We meet again Ms. Baldwin's heartwarming characters Bridget, Duncan, Brenna, Ronan, Logan and many more. To Love a Warrior is the story of Nellore, who had been found by Bridget, and raised by Duncan and Brenna, who became a fierce female warrior, with skil that surpassed many men. Garick, a brave Highlander warrior, had been fostered by Ronan and became a supporter to the cause of Robert the Bruce, the new King of Scotland. If you recall, Bridget holds the key to the Witch of Dervaig suspense, and at the end, will divulge her secret!Because this author is a very talented writer, this novel was a delight to read, it's very well written with some touch of humor. I was not disappointed, I truly recommend it, I also suggest that you read her first two books To Bewitch a Highlander then Highland Thunder. It's a marvelous Scottish adventure to get trapped in! Beautiful conclusion!

Missing in the Glades, written by Lena Diaz, is a non-stop, action packed, filled with danger, suspense and romance that will leave you on the edge of your seat! This captivating story is the 1st story in the Marshland Justice series. This author has outdone herself with this sexy and suspenseful thriller! Got pulled so fast into Jake and Faye's story, that I could not put it down.Jake Young, a private investigator on a mission, is part of a group of men working on solving strings of mysterious crimes set somewhere over the Florida Everglades. Enters Faye Star, to make matters more complicated into Jake's dangerous mission. Faye, an independent young sexy woman, gets caught in the turmoil, and now someone is threatening her! And both are hiding secrets from their past. Will Jake be able to protect her? Will they trust each other? Is love in the air for Jake and Faye!If you loved this romantic suspense, then dont forget to watch for the 2nd story Arresting Developments! I really enjoyed this exciting suspense!

What a fantastic assortment of holiday romances written especially for this set titled 12 Christmas Romances To Melt Your Heart!.My review is for Becca Boyd's romantic and sweet suspense!I chose, one of my favorites authors, Becca Boyd's charming novella As We Dream By The Fire. I had never read her contemporaries and I'm so glad I did, I'm not disappointed. I discovered that I love firefighters heroes!This novella was fun to read! It tells the story of Sadie, who needs a fresh start and Hudson, a handsome firefighter! During Christmas time, an arsonist is spreading fire in a small town, so Hudson is on the look-out to catch him. Unfortunately, he crashed down at the wrong home and meets Sadie in a awkward situation. You won't believe what happened next! Will this unwelcome guest be the start of a beautiful relationship?As We Dream By The Fire, will be the perfect novella to read on Christmas Eve! Its short, romantic and well written.I recommend that you offer this box set, because 100% of the proceeds from sales of this anthology will go to the Autism Society of America.

I just love, the Brethren of the Coast series, written by Barbara Devlin. I love the style of writing of this author! I have read all of her previous books, which found so captivating and fun to read. She has outdone herself with her new novella Love With An Improper Stranger. I could not put this one down, read it in one day!Love With An Improper Stranger, tells the story of Nautionnier Knight Blake, a devilish rogue, a kind and loving man, but also a bad-tempered knight who meets the independent, charming but stubborn Lenore Teversham. I loved the chemistry between the two, they were perfect for each other. Lenore and her sister Lucilla, had carefully planned, by ship, their return to London. Unfortunately, things did go as planned! Enters the charming Blake, a blackguard, to disrupt their lives. During her sea voyage, Lenore will suffer from seasickness and Blake will offer his help to heal and protect her, but the lady is so proud and stubborn! Some amusing moments! Will she fall for this devilish rogue? Will the fun begin? Will temptation be to hard to resist for Blake? A plot will put Lenore and Lucilla in danger! What will happen next?Just enjoy and follow Blake and Lenore's journey, filled with ups and downs, danger, intrigue and passion!I absolutely love the Brethren of the Coast series and her beautiful characters! Barbara Devlin never disappoints me!

* *A copy of this book was provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review! **Sweet Ride, written by Cathryn Fox, is a sizzling romance filled with two passionate characters Curtis and Alix. The chemistry between the two is hot and sexy! Lots of steamy scenes! It's a quick read, well written and fun to read! Its the third story in the Playing for Keeps series.

Lana Williams never ceases to amaze me! I saw this novella, A Knight's Christmas Wish, free at Amazon, and decided to give it a try. What a beautiful surprise, I loved it!It tells the short medieval journey of Sir Rylan and Lady Kayte. Rylan, an injured knight on a mission,  shows up at Kayte's castle, to announce her some terrible news, that will disturb her life and his in the process. He only wants to rush home to Scotland and spend Christmas with his family, but being bruised and ill, he will be nursed back to health by this charming Kayte, but she'll need something in return, What will she request from him? Will she asks for his protection? What will happen during their journey?Again,  A Knight's Christmas Wish, is a well written novella, a quick read, filled with romance and adventure. Ideal for an afternoon reading to get you in the mood for Christmas!

I love intense romances! The Last Shot, by Sara Hubbard, is a sexy, can' t put down romance novel of second chance!It tells the touching story of broken souls in search of love. Her characters Annie and Ethan, have flaws, which makes this story more realistic! Annie, a nurse, always loved Ethan, since they were teenagers, but their relationship became too intense for her, so she decided to let him live his own dream of becoming a famous hockey player. They both came from broken families and had suffered so much. But destiny, will bring them together, when Ethan's brother, Manny, is injured and brought to the hospital where Annie is working. When they meet again, old feelings come back, which becomes a love/hate relationship. Ethan, loves her so much, that he will do anything to win her heart and get her back, but he is an impulsive emotional guy. After a three years separation, lots of emotions overwhelm them! Also, their family relationship is very complicated. Do they still share the same feeling for each others? Will she give him a second chance? Will his brother Manny, intervene to get those two stubborn lovers, back together?  Just, go and grab this one when it comes out, you won't be disappointed!Ms. Hubbard wrote a well written, fast-paced, sexy and romantic story of second chance. You dont need to be hockey fan, to love The Last Shot, just a romantic soul!

If you believe in the magic of Christmas, you'll love Rainbow Christmas, a touching and sweet Irish love story of two broken souls in search of love! I spent a wonderful afternoon, reading this beautiful novella, written, but Cynthia Owens, her sixth story in The Claddagh series.It tells the story of Lissa, a very determine young woman and Pearse, a successful Irish doctor. When Lissa's cousin, Katie, asks her to come and visit her family in Ireland, she's happy to live her dream. Never having felt love in her family, she is quite surprise to be so welcomed by Katie's family and friends. Enters in her life, the charming doctor with fascinating eyes, Pearse,  who welcomes her with open arms. Will the magic of Ireland, give them peace of mind and reunite those two bruised souls in search of true love? Will Lissa's dreams come true  with the help of Pearse?Cynthia Owens, never disappoints me! Her stories are always well written, filled with strong emotions and tenderness. Some scenes are so emotional! Her charming characters will live a journey of ups and downs, healing and finally love!

I love time travel romance and For All of Ever, written by Sherry Ewing, was perfect for me! In this fantastic story, there is lots of romance between Katherine and her knight in shining armor Riorden! Both are rich characters blended into a well enveloped plot!

If you love stories about treasure, pirate, high sea adventure and of course romance, Cadha's Rogue, written by R.L. Syme, will surely please you! This is the fifth story in the Highland Renegades series. Its a fun pirate adventure with a spunky heroine. Ms. Syme didnt disappoint me!Cadha de Witt waits for her first love, Maas, to return to her from a high sea voyage, but she soon discovers that he did not returned and preferred to stay in Scotland. Her heart is broken, so she decides to find him at any costs! Cadha, is a brave, strong and determine young woman, who wants to find the man she loved since she had been a young girl. She will hire the help of a protector to travel to Scotland, but along the way, her journey will be filled with twists and turns, and the discovery of a new man. Now, her hearts is torn between two men, the man she once loved Maas and this new protector Valc! Which man will she choose? But when she will decide, she will never let him go!This story was well written, with beautiful characters and an intrigue that kept my interest until the end. Also the plot was well created with a fast paced, a real page turner!

Walls of Baylon is another one of Kathryn Le Veque's captivating medieval stories, filled with passion and emotions! Again, she weaved her main characters Kenton and Nicola into a well developed plot that will keep you in suspense until the very end. It's an amazing medieval tale that will sweep you away! A must to read for all historical lovers and fans of Ms. Le Veque's brave knight's adventures! She has weaved again a tale worthy of her talent, her style of writing caught my attention.I loved Walls of Babylon and looking forward to reading Ms. Le Veque's next novel!

A Knight's Quest, is a great debut, for Lana Williams's new series Falling For a Knight!This author is so talented, that each time, I'm please with her book, she never disappoints me! If you love a romantic story, filled with honor and love, then this one will be perfect for you!It tells the story of Sophia and Garrick! Lady Sophia is struggling with her life after the devastating attack on Berwick, Scotland. She has to keep her family safe! The arrival of an English knight will change her life forever. But, Sir Garrick de Bremont is on a secret mission in Berwick! His quest should be simple, but it becomes complex, as English knights are not welcome there. Sophia is attracted to him, but can she trust him? She needs to help her people, but some are cautious with her, they think she is a traitor. She will do anything to free her brother William, who is imprisoned accused of treason.  But who is the real traitor? Will their love survive all the obstacles along their journey? I liked the secondary characters Braden, Ilisa and Chanse.If you love historical romances, intertwined with mystery, adventure, and a dash of paranormal, then, A Knight's Quest, will please you! Its filled with twists and turns!

As soon as I started reading the first chapter of Tempted by a Rogue, it got me hooked till the very end; I could not put it down and I read it late into the night to finish it. Lauren Smith didnt disappoint me with this beautiful love story! It's a real page turner!It tells the story of Gemma, who's been in love, for eleven years, with James, the man she was corresponding with. But her hero James, isn't the man he pretends to be! Will his secret identity be revealed? Will he lose the woman he loves dearly? Will she feel betrayed? Can their love survive under these new conditions?Again, their story is filled with passion, seduction and romance! I really love Lauren Smith's books and I strongly recommend her novella Tempted by a Rogue, you will love it and won't be disappointed!

I have to say, that Kate Robbins, never disappoints me! Her new novella, Highlander Bewitched, really caught my attention, just by admiring it's stunning cover. It's a captivating Scottish romance like I love them, part one of A Highland Chiefs series! I really enjoyed it, its perfect for an afternoon lecture!It tells the story of Calum MacIntosh, brother of the great MacIntosh chief and Gwendolyn MacGregor, a young lady, who lost her title and wealth, but now serving as a personal maid. Gwen is a determine young lady, a free spirit and the healer for the Chattan Clan. Enters Calum, who is soon enchanted by Gwen, as soon as their eyes met, he is mesmerized by her. Gwen, also feels the strong connection to him! They soon share confidences, but when Gwen dares to share her dark secret, will it push him away? Will Calum, ignore the consequences, and fall for this sweet and charming maid? Can love be possible between them? Will the Highland magic ignite a beautiful passion between Calum and Gwen? Just follow their romantic adventure!Get yourself be swept away by this excellent short Highland journey filled with tenderness, adventure and magic. Its short, sweet, and leaves you wanting more! I strongly recommend this novella!

Thank you NetGalley and Kensington Books for a copy in exchange for my honest opinion.Amazing debut for new-to-me author Heather Grothaus. What a wonderful surprise to discover this little gem! Valentine, introduces us, to the Brotherhood of Fallen Angels, a new series set in the medieval Holy Land where four Crusaders Valentine, Roman, Adrian and Constantine meet. It's a real page turner! The author slowly built the suspense to keep me hooked to Valentine and Maria's story until the last page! I really could not stop reading to know what would happen next. I could not get enough of this romantic love story filled with passion and action!It tells the journey of Valentine Alesander, a lover, a fighter, a charmer, a passionate man but not a traitor! He is accused of having orchestrated the destruction of Chastellet, set during the battle between the Templar defenders and the Saladin's army in Syria. He is now a criminal wanted by the crown. How will he prove his innocence?Enters his life, the beautiful, nave and free-spirited Lady Mary Beckham!Discovering a secret about her birthright, she needs to find this wandering man, to move on with her life. Mary had always lived a lonely life, after her parents had died, when she was an infant. She now lived, under guardianship, hidden away, until the King could find the perfect man to replace her father. She may be nave, but she is smart and adventurous! Will she run away to find Valentine?A new adventure begins for them! Upon meeting Valentine, Mary soon falls under his charm! The chemistry between the two is so powerful! The teasing, between the two, added spice to their new relationship! Some scenes are so cute and charming, I had to giggle. As time went by, they started to understand the meaning of friendship, trust and passion. But their journey, will be filled with twists and turns, specially with a traitor lurking in their lives.I really had so much fun following these two passionate characters that I strongly recommend that you read this amazing medieval adventure. You won't be disappointed!I'm looking forward to reading next Adrian's adventure. Brotherhood of Fallen Angels is a series to follow! Valentine will be released on June 23rd.

I really loved One Knight Standing, written by Kate Robbins and Ian Gillies. It is a beautiful tale to enjoy! A must to read!One Knight Standing, is the story of William, a charming knight and Catherine, a determine young woman who lives at Rosslyn Castle. It all started when the clan priest had died mysteriously and had to be replaced, enters Will, at Rosslyn, but he looks more like a warrior than a priest. Catherine, is curious, and wants to discover who is really Will! And she is so nave, I adored the part when she confessed her sins of impure thoughts! This scene was so cute and done with a touch of humor. The chemistry between Will and Catherine is adorable. Will they discover the true mystery behind Rosslyn Castle?This story is truly fun to read, with mystery, love, romance and humour. Ms. Robbins never disappoints me! She is truly a very talented writer! It was so nice to me her co-author Ian Gillies, hoping that he will write alone a book!

I won this book in a GoodReads First reads Giveaway!Truly, I didn't know what to expect when I received Cheryl MacDonald's book Colonel Nichol and the Murdered Maiden. Part of it, was interesting, but I'm not really a history fan. This book tells the story of Robert Nichol, quartermaster general of militia for Upper Canada and Nichols devoted companion and servant Wallace. Set during the dangerous time when Upper Canada was at war in 1812, the character Nichol really existed, but Wallace is a fictional character.Ms. MacDonald is a very descriptive writer and she must have done an excellent research for this book. Politic, murderer, secrets and mystery.

I received an eARC of The Madness of Lord Westfall, from the publisher and NetGalley, in exchange for an honest review. So when I read the description of this book, written by Mia Marlowe, I really wanted to read it, to discover, it has a touch of paranormal romance. This is the second story in a new series Order of the MUSE!I tells the story of Pierre Langdon, a mad Viscount! When he was young, he fell from a tree and woke to hear strange voices. When the voices grow stronger as he grows older, his family commits him. But he soon discovers that his special ability is to hear the thoughts of those around him. That's when enters the M.U.S.E. Metaphysical Union of Sensory Extraordinaires, a group of people with psychic gifts. Enters in his life also, the charming Lady Nora Claremont! Will he know her every thoughts? Beautiful chemistry between Pierre and Nora!This story is fast paced, intriguing with intrigue, mystery, passion and a touch of paranormal!

Excellent box set to recommend!Amazing stories filled with love and magic!  Highland Flames: A Scrolls of Cridhe is a wonderful collection of talented writers. Seven authors, such as Kate Robbins, Victoria Zak, Ceci Giltenan, Tarah Scott, Lily Baldwin, Sue-Ellen Welfonder, and Kathryn Lynn Davis  have reunited to offer their readers amazing novellas filled love, faith, trust and a touch of magic. I've read five novellas in this box set and here are my reviews for them!I really loved One Knight Standing, written by Kate Robbins and Ian Gillies Its the story of William, a charming knight and Catherine, a determine young woman who lives at Rosslyn Castle. It all started when the clan priest had died mysteriously and had to be replaced, enters Will, at Rosslyn, but he looks more like a warrior than a priest. Catherine, is curious, and wants to discover who is really Will! And she is so nave, I adored the part when she confessed her sins of impure thoughts! This scene was so cute and done with a touch of humor. The chemistry between Will and Catherine is adorable. Will they discover the true mystery behind Rosslyn Castle?I was delighted to read Highland Destiny, written by Victoria Zak. Again, her fantastic story about the Dragonkine, the Guardians of Scotland, kept me fascinated until the very end. Love and magic will be in the air for her characters Rory and Kenna! This is the story of Kenna, a healer and and weapon artisan, and her sexy dragon shifter named Rory. As a young girl, Kenna, had always seen visions, but one night, she sees a mysterious vision that will scare her to death and make her run away for good. Five years later, she meets, a strange man, that can shift from human to dragon, he's Rory, a Dragonkine warrior! Sparks flare all over! Will they find true love! Highland Destiny is a short novella with two charming characters and a well develop plot. A must to read if you love a paranormal with a touch of magic and lots of loving!Sue-Ellen Welfonder is the author this Scottish romance, Winter Fire, full of tenderness and passion. She always writes tales that keep my interest until the end. I loved her characters, Gunmar MacLeod, known as the Lord of Winter and Katla MacKenzie, a beautiful lady! Beautiful chemistry between the two! Will Katla give her heart to this charming man? Will he be able to protect her? Will love be in the air for those two? This is a charming tale to enjoy! A great paranormal romance to recommend!What a fantastic and captivating story, written by Lily Baldwin! I really enjoyed Jack: A Scottish Outlaw, very much!  You will love Jack MacFie and Isabella Redesdale, they are so beautiful together and the chemistry between these two is filled with love. Both crave freedom, and this story is about an adventure towards freedom! Together, they will pull you slowly into their lives! Just follow their journey! Because this author is a very talented writer, this novella was a delight to read, it's very well written with some touch of humor. I was not disappointed, I truly recommend itWhat can I say, Tarah Scott is truly a talented storyteller, she just caught again my interest. I could not put LORD RUTHVEN'S BRIDE down, another fun and romantic story by one of my favorite authors. This novella is a quick read with interesting characters, a well develop intrigue, and filled with mystery and romance. Again, she didn't disappoint me. Set in Scotland 1823, it tells the story of James and Annabelle, who meet in a very strange, delicate and funny situation. The heroine is a beautiful person, stubborn with the bad habit of being too curious, that, sometimes, puts her in very awkward situations. The hero, the son of an obscure knight, has inherited a new title and is now investigating the murders of several young women. Annabelle, gets caught in the middle of this investigation, is kidnapped by a bad man and soon saved by James, who will steal, also her heart! Now Annabelle is torn between Calum, a man she is betrothed to and James, who saved her life. Which one will she choose? But a few stolen kisses will help decide to choose the right man for her. Another beautiful tale, filled with love, intrigue and danger by this talented author!

I read this beautiful story, in 2013, but forgot to write a review!Jennifer McQuiston is a very talented author, her story kept my interest until the end. I loved her characters, the storyline was well written and the plot well developed. I'm looking forward to read her other books.

What a beautiful story is this book, If My Heart Could See You, nicely written by Sherry Ewing, it's stunning, powerful and emotional! I loved the characters Dristan of Blackmore, a knight with a heart of gold and Amiria of Berwick, a proud and stubborn lady, their story stole my breath away!After reading many Medieval romances, Ms. Ewing's book, took me by surprise, I could not put it down, she got me hooked to Dristan and Amiria's romantic and perilous story! If My Heart Could See You, is the love story, of two beautiful souls, along a journey filled with twists and turns, loyalty, betrayal, honour, trust and passion. The story starts, after the invasion of Berwyck castle, by Dristan, as the champion knight of King Henry II, when Amiria, decides to hide under the identity of her brother, dressed as a young man.  Slowly, he will notice her trickery and challenge her in combat which will create awkward but beautiful moments, making it harder to resist her. Is there any hope, for love, when both are enemies? Only time will tell!We meet other interesting characters such as Lynet, Ian, Sabina, Patrick.I'm looking forward to read the next story A Knight to Call my Own, which will be Ian and Lynet's own story. It's a real page turner to devour! Another amazing tale to recommend!

I received an eARC from the publisher and NetGalley in exchange for an honest review!This is the first time that I read a book written by Connie Brockway, and I'm so happy to have read Highlander Undone, it was so much fun to read! As I started to read it, I soon got captivated and it kept my interest until the end.It tells the story of Jack Cameron, a loyal Scottish captain in the British army, and Addie Hoodless, a beautiful widow, who both suffer from emotional wounds from their past! Posing as an artist, Jack decides to infiltrate the close circle of friends at Teds studio to listen in on the unguarded conversations of the officers. But first, he must win Addies trust despite the emotional wounds of her past. How, will she react to his betrayal? Will Addies life be in danger? Will Jack be able to protect her? Can love survive under these conditions!A beautiful story of suspense, betrayal, trust and love! I'm looking forward to read her other books!

This review is for Renee Vincent's novella, a great introduction to her new cowboy romance series!I enjoyed this short prequel, written by Renee Vincent, titled LONGING FOR LANGSTON, part of upcoming InkHeart Authors boxed set LOVE EVER AFTER. It's also, a nice introduction to The Mavericks of Meeteetse Series, to be released this Fall!An eARC was gifted to me in exchange for my honest opinion!This is a sweet romance, set in Meeteetse, a small town in Wyoming, between a sexy and rugged cowboy and beautiful young woman! What do you think will happen, when they meet, temptation, desire and passion! Brody, had always loved his childhood best friend, Olivia! She is a waitress at a cowboy bar but has a dream, to become a famous singer! Will she leave Brody to start a new career? Will he let her go? What will happen to them? I enjoyed, so much this prequel, that I am anxiously awaiting her first book called Made For McKinley, which will be Jonas's own story with Ava! Will follow, Falling for Forester and Wild for Wallace!
I  absolutely loved, In a Stranger's Arms, with it's charming characters blended into a sweet romance!

J'ai vraiment aim le premier roman de Julianne MacLean, Captive du Highlander, sa premire histoire dans sa trilogie Le Highlander. J'ai beaucoup son style d'criture! Beaucoup d'action et intrigue!Lady Amelia Templeton prfrerait mourir que de cder  un homme tel que Duncan MacLean. Cest le guerrier le plus froce de son clan, lennemi jur de la jeune femme. Venu tuer le fianc dAmelia, celui-ci se ravise lorsquil remarque la ravissante innocente et dcide de lenlever, saisissant loccasion de se venger de celui qui a assassin lamour de sa vie. Mais lady Amelia refuse dtre un pion passif au milieu de ce conflit. La jeune femme, aussi belle que courageuse, provoquera chez le Highlander un sentiment encore plus puissant que sa fureur guerrire.Si vous aimez des romans d'amour, situes en cosse, je vous suggre, donc, ce fascinant roman historique. J'ai t captive ds la premire page! J'ai aim les personnages Duncan et Amelia; beaucoup de chimie dans leur relation! Cette histoire fut fantastique du commencement jusqu' la fin. Beaucoup de dtails historiques. Si vous aimez des histoires mdivales, remplies d'amour et d'aventure, je suggre donc ce beau roman Captive du Highlander.

J'ai beaucoup la conclusion de la srie Le Highlander, crite par Julianne MacLean. Son 3e roman Sduite par le Highlander m'a plu normment. Je n'ai pas t dsappointe! J'aime tellement son style d'criture, que les mots s'envolent sur les pages et tiennent mon intrt en alerte. Une autre fascinante histoire cossaise  ne pas manquer.Lachlan MacDonald triomphe des hommes sur les champs de bataille et des femmes dans lintimit... Mais une sorcire dont il a repouss les avances lui jette un sort pour se venger : dsormais, toutes ses conqutes seront promises  une mort certaine.Lady Catherine est une ravissante amnsique qui dsespre de retrouver sa vritable identit. Quand ses yeux se posent sur Lachlan, elle croit dtenir la cl de son pass  et peut-tre mme de son cur. Mais le guerrier est persuad que cest elle qui la ensorcel. Cette passion ne risque-t-elle pas de les mener tous deux  leur perte ?Je recommande fortement Sduite par le Highlander, une histoire attachante, remplie d'amour et d'aventure!

J'adore cette trilogie crite pour Julianne Maclean! Elle est l'une de mes auteures prfres pour les romans histoires de guerriers des Highlands de l'cosse.J'ai lu le deuxime livre Conquise par le Highlander. J'ai simplement ador! J'ai beaucoup aim ses personnages principaux Angus, le guerrier sexy, et Gwendolen, sa nouvelle compagne. Leur histoire fut fantastique du commencement jusqu' la fin. J'ai t accroch de la premire page et ne pouvais pas le poser.Avec sa crinire fauve et son corps rompu aux combats, Angus MacDonald est le guerrier le plus redoutable quait jamais vu lady Gwendolen MacEwen. Lorsquil sempare du chteau de sa famille, Gwendolen se voit contrainte de partager le lit de celui qui a dfait son clan. Belle et fire, cette jeune femme qui rsiste a ses assauts exaspr Angus autant quelle lattire. Il doit pourtant se marier avec elle pour runir leurs deux clans. Amusez-vous  suivre leur prilleux parcours!Sans rserve, je recommande ce livre si vous l'ensemble les histoires d'amour qui se droulent en cosse. Vous ne serez pas dus par ce livre. Je suis excit de lire le dernier roman Sduite par le Highlander!

Highland Flames: A Scrolls of Cridhe is a wonderful collection of talented writers. Seven authors, such as Kate Robbins, Victoria Zak, Ceci Giltenan, Tarah Scott, Lily Baldwin, Sue-Ellen Welfonder, and Kathryn Lynn Davis  have reunited to offer their readers amazing novellas filled love, faith, trust and a touch of magic. I've read five novellas in this box set and here are my reviews for them!I really loved One Knight Standing, written by Kate Robbins and Ian Gillies Its the story of William, a charming knight and Catherine, a determine young woman who lives at Rosslyn Castle. It all started when the clan priest had died mysteriously and had to be replaced, enters Will, at Rosslyn, but he looks more like a warrior than a priest. Catherine, is curious, and wants to discover who is really Will! And she is so nave, I adored the part when she confessed her sins of impure thoughts! This scene was so cute and done with a touch of humor. The chemistry between Will and Catherine is adorable. Will they discover the true mystery behind Rosslyn Castle?I was delighted to read Highland Destiny, written by Victoria Zak. Again, her fantastic story about the Dragonkine, the Guardians of Scotland, kept me fascinated until the very end. Love and magic will be in the air for her characters Rory and Kenna! This is the story of Kenna, a healer and and weapon artisan, and her sexy dragon shifter named Rory. As a young girl, Kenna, had always seen visions, but one night, she sees a mysterious vision that will scare her to death and make her run away for good. Five years later, she meets, a strange man, that can shift from human to dragon, he's Rory, a Dragonkine warrior! Sparks flare all over! Will they find true love! Highland Destiny is a short novella with two charming characters and a well develop plot. A must to read if you love a paranormal with a touch of magic and lots of loving!Sue-Ellen Welfonder is the author this Scottish romance, Winter Fire, full of tenderness and passion. She always writes tales that keep my interest until the end. I loved her characters, Gunmar MacLeod, known as the Lord of Winter and Katla MacKenzie, a beautiful lady! Beautiful chemistry between the two! Will Katla give her heart to this charming man? Will he be able to protect her? Will love be in the air for those two? This is a charming tale to enjoy! A great paranormal romance to recommend!What a fantastic and captivating story, written by Lily Baldwin! I really enjoyed Jack: A Scottish Outlaw, very much!  You will love Jack MacFie and Isabella Redesdale, they are so beautiful together and the chemistry between these two is filled with love. Both crave freedom, and this story is about an adventure towards freedom! Together, they will pull you slowly into their lives! Just follow their journey! Because this author is a very talented writer, this novella was a delight to read, it's very well written with some touch of humor. I was not disappointed, I truly recommend itWhat can I say, Tarah Scott is truly a talented storyteller, she just caught again my interest. I could not put LORD RUTHVEN'S BRIDE down, another fun and romantic story by one of my favorite authors. This novella is a quick read with interesting characters, a well develop intrigue, and filled with mystery and romance. Again, she didn't disappoint me. Set in Scotland 1823, it tells the story of James and Annabelle, who meet in a very strange, delicate and funny situation. The heroine is a beautiful person, stubborn with the bad habit of being too curious, that, sometimes, puts her in very awkward situations. The hero, the son of an obscure knight, has inherited a new title and is now investigating the murders of several young women. Annabelle, gets caught in the middle of this investigation, is kidnapped by a bad man and soon saved by James, who will steal, also her heart! Now Annabelle is torn between Calum, a man she is betrothed to and James, who saved her life. Which one will she choose? But a few stolen kisses will help decide to choose the right man for her. Another beautiful tale, filled with love, intrigue and danger by this talented author!If you love short romantic novellas, then these stories are perfect for you!

Captivated By a Lady's Charm, nicely written by Christi Caldwell, is a romantic story with passion, scandal, betrayal and love. The characters, Christian and Prudence, are charming, and nicely blended into a well developed plot.Christian Villiers, the Marquess of St. Cyr, despises the role he's been cast into as fortune hunter but requires the funds! Lady Prudence Tidemore's life is filled with familial scandals, which makes it hard to find the right husband, who will accept her past. When Prudence runs into Christian on a London street, this charming gentleman immediately captures her attention. Christian has, also, demons hunting his past! Prudence will do anything in her power to get Christian, but the man is stubborn. Just follow their journey, to see what will happen next!Christi Caldwell is a talented author and I love her books, they are always refreshing, romantic and fun to read! If you love historical romances, then you'll love Captivated By a Lady's Charm, do give it a try, you won't be disappointed!  This one is her second story in the Lords of Honor series, a beautiful series to follow!
Excellent quality for the price!
Excellent quality for the price!

Backstretch Baby, is another great read from Bev Pettersen! Horse lovers will like this story because its setin the horse racing world, with several charming characters, like Rick Talbot, the private investigator and Eve Lewis, the young horse trainer.Both their worlds will collide, because Rick is asked to investigate a robbery where Eve works! At first, she doesnt trust him, but as time goes by,sparks flare to start a beautiful relationship between Rick, Eve and her son Joey. And in all stories, you always find a mean character like Liam!Will Rick be able to protect her? Will love be in the air for those two?I recommend Backstretch Baby to everyone, but especially to readers who love horses.
I really enjoyed this short and light novella of a pirate romance!

This is an excellent box set of beautiful stories nicely written by talented author Christi Caldwell! Her stories are always captivating with charming characters.A must to read if you love your books with a romance touch!
I just love this wonderful series written by Barbara Devlin, with charming characters intertwined into great plots!

Hanover House is a prequel to Brenda Novak's new series Hanover House Chronicles!This is my first read by this author.It tell the fascinating story of  Psychiatrist Evelyn Talbot, who has dedicated her life to solving the mysteries.  As a  teenager, she had been kidnapped, tortured and left for dead  her high school boyfriend. This is one of the mean reason she became a psychiatrist.  Hanover House is a high security prison for serial killers in Alaska! Her job will become more complex when the suspense begins. Will she be able to cope with the stress, danger and twists and turns. Beware! You'll be sitting at the edge of your seat!Thank you NetGalley for a copy of your book!

What a refreshing romance, skillfully written by Anna Campbell, with charming characters that you won't be able to resist loving! Readers who love regencies, will be delighted with The Seduction of Lord Stone, a beautiful novella in her new series. I found Silas and Caroline's story so refreshing, charming and fun to read. It's perfect for an afternoon read! I could not put it down, I had to read it in one shot!Set in London 1820, Caroline, Lady Beaumont, a young thirty years old widow. While being married, she had lived a lonely life without passion, she is now independent and ready to seek adventure by finding a lover. Along with her two friends, young widows, too, Helena and Fenella, they decide to call themselves the dashing widows! Who will capture her heart? Enters in her life, devilish Silas Nash, a long time friend and confident, who secretly admires her. Then the fun began and a delightful game of seduction started between Silas and Caroline.I really love all of Anna Campbell's stories! I highly recommend this novella filled with humor, hope and passion. A sexy romance to enjoy! A must to read!Im looking forward to read Helena and Fenellas own stories in Tempting Mr. Townsend and Winning Lord West.

I received an eARC of My Lady Faye, from the publisher and NetGalley, in exchange for an honest review.My Lady Faye, written by Sarah Hegger, is a beautiful story of second chance!I liked her two main characters Fay and Gregory! It tells the story of Fay, who becomes finally free from her awful husband and looking forward to a brighter future! Lots of twists and turns! That's whenGregory, a man she had loved dearly in the past, comes back in her life to protect her. Will she get a second chance? Will Gregory follow his heart?We meet again, her characters from her 1st story Sweet Bea, Beatrice and Garrett.This story was charming and sweet!

I have had these headphones for over three years and they are by far the best headphones I have owned. I have brought several brands of headphones since then only to be disappointed.Durable; when you hold it in your hands, it feels it can last quite a while. Very comfortable cushion that makes me forget they are even on my head.I listen to all types of music and these do very well for a wide variety of sounds. These have deep bass and crisp highs.My only complaint is the 3.5 cord with mic that comes with these headphones SUCKS and broke within the first month. I loved the headphones so much I brought a different cord and have been using them that way ever since. I hope the newer models have a better 3.5 cable but until the ones I own stop working I will be using them with the alternate cable.

I have had these wires in my car for over a year and have been impressed so far. I have not had any distortion and they have held up where it counts most, under the hood.  The fuse that comes with this kit is great and easy to replace if needed. I was a little nervous using the RCA cables that came with the kit because they didnt seem to be the highest quality but they performed well for the past year.  I have had several different systems and used many different cables to hook my systems up.The most essential part of a amp kit is the RCAs because if they are not made well you can lose a lot of sound quality to interference. The cables that come with the package are not the best but do the job. If you want a added peace of mind about sound quality buy this kit and buy some high quality rca cables because the rest of the cables are great.

3:28 MinsI ordered this speaker after I received the Anker cube speaker because my wife loved the cubed speaker so much  I had to basicaly pry it from her hands everyday. I ordered this speaker for her because it was $20 cheaper and had overall good reviews.This review will be more of a camparisson between this speaker and the cube speaker which are both made by anker. Hopefully this helps for people who are on the fence about which anker speaker to buy.Both speakers are a great buy and this speaker is like the little brother to the cubed speaker. Both speakers deliver excellent sound for the size but the cubed speaker deliver a deeper fuller sound.This speakers is great for a office, dorm room and for personally use. It does not get lound enough to to deliver a good sound while outside if there is alot of outside noise but for personall use this is perfect.The cubbed speaker came with a little travel bag but this one dosent.I saw a few reviews about the speaker having the annoying voice promt but the once I recieved did not have any voice promts. I think Anker actually read the reviews and made the changes.$20 for this travel speaker is perfect and sounds better than many speakers in its class. If you are debating between the cubed speaker and this speaker it call comes down to how much you want to spend.I think both are great buys.Check back on my reivew for a video post showing the difference.

update Jan 9th 2015, the clip the holds the camera in place broke. Now I have a worthless paper weight. I only used the tripod five times and I was always delicate with it. I was surprised at the quality of this tripod, it seems very sturdy and while suite my needs just fine. This tripod is a little heavier than the more expensive tripods but for the price I can't complain. Wet Silence: Poems about Hindu Widows by Sweta Srivastava Vikram is a heart touching and inspiring collection of poems written by Hindu widows from India. In the Hindu culture, when a woman loses her husband, she cannot remarry, she has to wear white saris, and she also can't eat certain foods anymore. This is a collection of poems depicting some of the most intimate emotions a woman can muster. Some of the widows miss their husbands dearly, while others are happy to be free of their abuser. The emotions are profound, heart wrenching,  yet beautiful. These women are not telling their story to ask for help, though, they simply and only break their Silence and allow their most inner voices to be heard. Beautiful, painful, and raw!Wet Silence: Poems about Hindu Widows by Sweta Srivastava Vikram is a book that will easily touch many readers, young and adult, women and men...*Book was provided for free in exchange for unbiased and honest review.

These are good-sounding earbuds.  They generally have a broad frequency response.  The bass is clear and assertive without being at all boomy; easy enough to distinguish many bass notes.  The high end is somewhat less transparent, but still good.  And the midrange is right where it should be - not dwarfed by boomy bass and blasting high end.Fit is totally subjective, but these do not fit my ears all that well.  I am a man with average-size ears, and most earbuds fit fine.  The barrel on these is a little long.  I find that they tend to loosen (which diminishes the sound) and eventually fall out.The cord is sturdy but a bit heavy.  This may be one of the reasons the buds do not stay in my ears.  Worse, when walking for exercise, the swaying cords transmit sound into the content I am listening to.I like the sound.  Not crazy about the fit.  A bit pricey.  They might well fit you better than they did me.

The concept of functioning of this device seems terrific, and I would love to give it 5 stars for its purpose.  Unfortunately, at least for the one I received, some modifications were required to make it work well, correcting what I see as a manufacturing problem / quality control issue.I also wish the unit provided somewhat longer rods so that the device would accommodate longer cards (the PCBs I need to work on are 11.5" long).  The vise is designed for PCB's up to 6" x 9", according to stellar technical dot com; this information does not appear on the Amazon page, nor even on the Weller site.  However, I found a hack that extends its maximum length.The problem with the unit, as I received it, is on the four clamp mechanisms for tightening down the sides firmly onto the 12mm rods: instead of having a slight gap that closes when you tighten the thumbscrews, the ends of the clamp jaws meet, and the hard plastic does not give way when you tighten.  This means that the 12mm rods cannot be made to fit snugly in the holes, and it is possible that the PCB could fall out of the vise if the sides slip out a bit.  Without any mods, it still works ok, thanks to the small rubber feet on the bottom of the sides, which cause it to mostly stay put at the width you want.I have three solutions to offer for dealing with the slipping rods:1. I used a saber saw to cut a gap into the jaw sides.  Remove the screws, then cut straight to the end from the hole.  If you want it a little wider, turn the cutting edge slightly towards the jaw side that does NOT have the rubber foot.  With this gap, it tightens firmly.2. You could go to the hardware store and buy a threaded rod 7/16" in diameter and four matching nuts.  Put it in the center hole of the two sides and use nuts to hold it in place.  These rods are usually sold in lengths of a few feet, so you will probably have to cut it to a convenient length (around 13").3. You could use two rubber bands placed around the feet part of the sides on each side to make the sides want to snap together.  Finding long enough rubber bands may be a challenge.  I did not try this, but I think it would work.To extend the maximum length capacity of the PCB, you can buy replacement 12mm rods (metal or plastic).  Amazon sells a suitable 12mm metal rod that I have ordered and will cut to about 16" long.  Unfortunately, hardware stores in USA tend to offer 7/16" or 1/2" rods (wood or metal).  One is too narrow to clamp snugly, and the other is too wide to fit in the hole.  You could file or drill the hole a little larger, but then the original 12mm rods will not snug up.With the mods, the vise works nicely.  You can rotate the board either in 15 degree increments, or continuously with an easy mod for which there are instructions.  This makes it easy to insert a thru component on one side, then flip the card to solder.  The anti-static feature (untested) seems great too, but you may want to consider an antistat wrist band if dealing with sensitive components.With my mod to the clamp, the device rates 5 stars.  But as it is provided out of the box, the inability to tighten the clamps onto the 12mm rods detracts from the expected function.  The mods took some time - sawing, then filing - and with proper manufacturing and quality control, should not be necessary.  This is the reason I am giving this product 3 stars as it works out of the box.I found two Web sites that sell this product for under fifty-five dollars.  One of them is mentioned above.  I notice that many others sell it from $70 to beyond $120.  Now I suppose it is always possible that the more expensive prices is for a newer version that corrects the problems, but then the device is fairly expensive for what it is.

The concept of functioning of this device seems terrific, and I would love to give it 5 stars for its purpose.  Unfortunately, at least for the one I received, some modifications were required to make it work well, correcting what I see as a manufacturing problem / quality control issue.I also wish the unit provided somewhat longer rods so that the device would accommodate longer cards (the PCBs I need to work on are 11.5" long).  The vise is designed for PCB's up to 6" x 9", according to stellar technical dot com; this information does not appear on the Amazon page, nor even on the Weller site.  However, I found a hack that extends its maximum length.The problem with the unit, as I received it, is on the four clamp mechanisms for tightening down the sides firmly onto the 12mm rods: instead of having a slight gap that closes when you tighten the thumbscrews, the ends of the clamp jaws meet, and the hard plastic does not give way when you tighten.  This means that the 12mm rods cannot be made to fit snugly in the holes, and it is possible that the PCB could fall out of the vise if the sides slip out a bit.  Without any mods, it still works ok, thanks to the small rubber feet on the bottom of the sides, which cause it to mostly stay put at the width you want.I have three solutions to offer for dealing with the slipping rods:1. I used a saber saw to cut a gap into the jaw sides.  Remove the screws, then cut straight to the end from the hole.  If you want it a little wider, turn the cutting edge slightly towards the jaw side that does NOT have the rubber foot.  With this gap, it tightens firmly.2. You could go to the hardware store and buy a threaded rod 7/16" in diameter and four matching nuts.  Put it in the center hole of the two sides and use nuts to hold it in place.  These rods are usually sold in lengths of a few feet, so you will probably have to cut it to a convenient length (around 13").3. You could use two rubber bands placed around the feet part of the sides on each side to make the sides want to snap together.  Finding long enough rubber bands may be a challenge.  I did not try this, but I think it would work.To extend the maximum length capacity of the PCB, you can buy replacement 12mm rods (metal or plastic).  Amazon sells a suitable 12mm metal rod that I have ordered and will cut to about 16" long.  Unfortunately, hardware stores in USA tend to offer 7/16" or 1/2" rods (wood or metal).  One is too narrow to clamp snugly, and the other is too wide to fit in the hole.  You could file or drill the hole a little larger, but then the original 12mm rods will not snug up.With the mods, the vise works nicely.  You can rotate the board either in 15 degree increments, or continuously with an easy mod for which there are instructions.  This makes it easy to insert a thru component on one side, then flip the card to solder.  The anti-static feature (untested) seems great too, but you may want to consider an antistat wrist band if dealing with sensitive components.With my mod to the clamp, the device rates 5 stars.  But as it is provided out of the box, the inability to tighten the clamps onto the 12mm rods detracts from the expected function.  The mods took some time - sawing, then filing - and with proper manufacturing and quality control, should not be necessary.  This is the reason I am giving this product 3 stars as it works out of the box.I found two Web sites that sell this product for under fifty-five dollars.  One of them is mentioned above.  I notice that many others sell it from $70 to beyond $120.  Now I suppose it is always possible that the more expensive prices is for a newer version that corrects the problems, but then the device is fairly expensive for what it is.
